1.content:
2080, the world is a different place now. A new social reform forces people to shrink down if they have loans and allows them to grow again as soon as they have money. The bank decides about the size although they are not allowed to denie credits if you are not smaller than 3 cm (1 Inch) yet.

This was made to work against the hunger in the world. Small people need lesser food than big people but the big people establish the companies where the small and normal people work. The costs would be to high to simply grow food.

Citys have been completly renewed and where split up into territories. New settlements have been established where just poor or normal people live. The rich ones usually stay in the city to spend their money.

In big citys the rich people have their own territories where no poor people are allowed to come for safety reasons and to prevent burglars and beggers. Expectations are servants or which have to have a certain hight. In this areas the small ones are mere outlaws and nothing more than vermin which are not protected by any laws anymore. The rich ones don't really need to go to the slums where the small people live and are not allowed to go there by any means. In the living and working areas of the poor people, they are secured by the law.
This law stands just for the citys and their territory. Small citys and villages are accessable for everyone.

Because of the size of the people, buildings, cars and everything changes drastically from territory to territory. If they grow or shrink enough, they are forced to move into another territory which fits their new size.

Women became far more powerful than before. There where enough of them who had married rich and became a giantess or sold their bodys in the nightlife and became rich within a short time.

This new social 'fairness' has brought up new problems...

The staff's jaw dropped when he saw the huge face frame with blonde hair falling like tendrils over the tarmac, and that cleavage. Moving quickly to avoid a swinging pendant, which smashed into the club wall, the staff member tried to talk.....

"Well, are you going to let me in! It's Anna, I own much of this fucking town!""

"Er er yes, but........."

The next thing he knew was that Anna had peeled the roof off the club and tossed it aside, exposing the dance floor, and the music. Strangely most revellers didn't really notice as they were either too drunk or high to care, anyway she looked stunning.

Taking another swig of her vodka, she began to dance....in the car park/parking lot. As she gyrated to the music dozens more cars got smashed as her platform shoe clad feet moved, well they wouldn't be in a fit state to drive home afterwards anyway, was Anna's light hearted response, if she really cared........
1151112111.title: Party time

choices: Oh the embarrassment as she falls headlong into the city
That was close as she steadies herself clutching a nearby skyscraper.
Why do they put these things there as she petulantly kicks the structure.
115111212.content: She wanted to make an impression in her first outing at her new size. As she normally did before a party she tanked herself up with alcohol to make it even more fun so when she finally left the house she was already a little unsteady on her feet. Her exit was followed by a crash of a two thirds empty vodka bottle and an expletive followed by a girly giggle. In the fast dimming light you could make out a massive figure in black. She had availed herself of a very short low cut black leather dress, scarcely covering her ample boobs or between her legs, and she was underwear-less. She wore tall matching boots with a platform taller than a one floor property and even taller heels and they went way above her knees, and long opera gloves way over her elbows. Her hair was worn loose, her blonde locks cascading down her scarcely covered back. And her jewellery, fresh from her late father's workshops, was plentiful and bright, necklaces, earrings, and gold cuffs over her gloved wrists which probably cost the GDP of a small country. At her size it was not far to the club even in her already tipsy state as she located the highway to town by noticing the tiny streetlamps ahead. An area of suburban housing was flattened without Anna even being aware as she was already feeling lightheaded and the platforms on her boots insulated her from noticing, not that she would have cared much anyway. Opening up her matching leather bag strapped to her waist she took out a half bottle of vodka there to tide her over and took a swig before setting foot on the highway. The crunches and screams at every step didn’t really register in her slightly buzzed state as cars were crumpled, though she did note that the streetlights tended to stop shining as she walked through. She was happy and carefree and now confidently strutting towards the club, as if saying “look at me!”. Just then: “Ooops, shit!”, she exclaimed as she stumbled on an overpass………….
115111212.title: Outfit 2

choices: Looked at the sights before going elsewhere.
115112.content: CRUNCH! She just couldn't help it. As she grew she stepped back and her sharp stiletto heel smashed into some parked cars driving them into the shop fronts behind. Sweeping her long blonde locks behind her ear with an exquisitely black leather gloved hand she looked behind her at the mess beneath her footwear. "Ooops, shit, did I just do that?", she smiled and giggled to herself before straightening herself up to her full 600ft height. Gloved hands on slim hips, encased in a short skirt as part of a smart suit, she started walking. "Might as well see this fucking city while I'm here, as I own the fucking place after all". Seemingly uncaring where she trod, many vehicles disappeared underfoot as she walked and people were fleeing before her in panic, she went downtown.
115112.title: Explore the City

1153.content:
Mr Harvey remembered the news he was bringing and swallowed the back of his throat but he had a job to do and he had to tell this girl about her money and family but shouldn't have done it in that order.

"Anna your family new scheme worked better than anyone expected you now own the world." This news shocked Anna two-fold, first she thought her family already ruled the world and second why should she care this was her father's job not her's but before she could comment Harvey started speaking again, " you now control everything from your family's old fast food to hotels to now full governments, cities, banks everything." Harvey was sweating this twit now ran the world but then Anna said something so stupid it shocked Harvey.

"So why should I care that's father's job not mine, stupid tiny." Anna said insulted by the fact this tiny has wasted her sacred time. Although she should be blamed for not even paying attention past "Anna your family new scheme" thinking it was not her responsibility. What Anna didn't realize was the hit-man she hired to kill her parents has already finished his job early leaving her with all her family wealth. Anna wasn't expecting it to happen so quickly so didn't know they where dead.

"This dumb bimbo isn't understanding anything and she now runs the world. We're fucked" Harvey said under his breath.
1153.title: Richest and most powerful woman on the planet

choices: Anna’s Trip to the Size Office
Anna decides to go see the little people first, and then grow afterwards.
11531.content: Upon learning of the successful business ventures, as well as the death of her parents, Anna soon realizes her, let’s call it, unique position. Her wealth has increased about 100 fold, and this can only mean one thing. “Get out of here. And send for my accountant,” Anna commanded. “As you wish, miss.” As the man turned to leave Anna began to dream of her new fortunes, and her soon-to-be increased size. *ring* *ring*. Anna’s phone lit up, as the number of her family accountant appeared on screen. “Yes, Conroy? No, I haven’t yet. Yes, I want to right away. I’ll be to the Size Office in 10 minutes, send them all of the paper work!” Anna rushed upstairs, her heart beating fast and her mind racing even faster. She already measured a massive 30 feet tall, and although she’d never seen anyone smaller than 10 feet, she knew far smaller people existed. She often contemplated leaving her rich neighborhood to go play with all the little people outside, but her father never would’ve allowed that. Fortunately for her, and unfortunately for those “little people,” she would soon realize this dream, and far larger than ever before.
11531.title: The Queen Bee

choices: A tiny man struggling with some stuff in the grass.
Some tiny ones fighting a crow.
She comes upon a tiny village.
She is attacked by tiny people
12.content:
Valerie was having a walk through the countryside, she was upset about her last date as her boyfriend had been a total snob. He treated the smaller people as his personal slaves. Valerie was against this size thing , she'd rather have everyone equally big, it would prevent this from happening.

Valerie detest most the guys in her neighbourhood, being around wealthy kids meant they only talked about how much money they had and which tiny person they saw and how tiny they were compared to them.

Valerie was not like that. Her parents raised her well, teaching her the right values and she was humble, not bragging about how many zeroes her allowance had. She would rather date one of those poor guys than those rich bastards. She was deep in thought when she saw...
12.title: Valerie Juschtchenko, a 18 year old highschool ...

choices: Valerie moves in for a closer look.
Valerie helps the poor guy out.
Valerie ignores the situation and continues on her way.
121.content:
Her deep blue eyes starring into nothingness, Valerie once again loses herself in deep contemplation.

"I suppose I understand why things are the way they are", Valerie's voice echos within her head as she strolls onward to no place in particular, rustling her thin, stretching fingers through her flowing red hair. "They can't afford food, so they should be smaller. That way they don't need as much. But the class system we live in today really bites. I mean, how am I going to grow as an individual if I'm surrounded by people just like me? Most people my height don't even care about the little people of our society. We don't understand how they live, so how can we..."

A miniscule tickling sensation brings Valerie back into the real world. Pathetically flimsy grass blades caress Valerie's exposed toes ever so gently. Accordingly, Valerie ceases her hike as her tan, thin face is tilted towards the ground, enabling her deep blue eyes to explore. She quickly notices the silky skin of her feet, poorly protected by her leathery sandles, has made contact with grass.

"Oops, I'm off the path", Valerie remarks.

Valerie's glance catches an invisible wave thrusting its way past the grass beside her. Closer inspection reveals a poor man, who appears to be roughly the same age as Valerie, being chased by four or five ants. Valerie estimates that the ants are as small poodles to the man, poodles strong enough to tear him limb from limb, but poodles nonetheless. It's difficult for Valerie to make out too much from her towering vantage point.
121.title: A tiny man struggling with some stuff in the gr...

choices: Valerie waits to see what Jimmy will do.
1211.content:
Her lightly tanned neck already angling her head downward, Valerie raises her softly petite hand perpendicular to her forehead. Sweaty droplets wet Valerie's improvised visor as she battles against the mid-afternoon sun for a better view of the action at her feet.

As Valerie struggles to asses the situation below, the moral perplexity within her mind is equally difficult. Valerie has been conditioned from birth to ignore the plights of those in the lower classes. The stakes in this particular instance are quite high, however. The young man before her could very well die without aid, and it would be so easy for Valerie to give that aid to boot. Not to mention the fact that this was a prime opportunity to finally meet a different type of person.

Unable to make up her mind, Valerie decides to move in for a closer look. After all, it appears there is still some time before the ants catch up with the speedy poor man. Valerie shifts her legs backward as her upper body makes its descent. She lays on the ground upon her stomach, her moist hands supporting her chin as her entrenched elbows serve as a solid foundation. All she can do now is watch and wait...

...Jimmy was on his last leg. Maybe it wasn't such a good idea to "climb the beanstalk". Jimmy probably would have succeeded if he would have even made it further than the grasslands, but that's beside the point. Now Jimmy needed a miracle , not to move up in the world, but just to survive.

"These things are too fast", Jimmy mutters to no one in particular. "They're like small poodles. How am I going to...".

It had taken Jimmy a moment to notice the sudden drop in temperature. In fact, if the world around him hadn't been enveloped in darkness he probably still wouldn't have noticed. This didn't make sense. Nightfall was still hours away. Just what was going on here?

Violent shaking threatens to topple Jimmy in mid stride. Jimmy finally turns his attention away from the area directly in front of him, and quickly realizes the cause of all of the strange phenomenon occurring.

Filling Jimmy's view are two clawed bulldozers dressed in brown leather tearing all of the lengthy green stalks unfortunate enough to be in their respective paths from their roots. Guiding this destruction are two monstrous bridges of flesh stretching for miles as they straighten themselves out. A perfectly flat plain of tan brown eclipsed by two white, independent mountainous regions collided with the ground with amazing speed and power. Two pillars dug themselves into the foreground of this magnificent vision.

Cranking his head upward, Jimmy sees two sparking blue eyes focused on his puny figure as they are surrounded by a lifeless sea of red. Needless to say, this is the last thing Jimmy wanted to see. All his life he had heard the horror stories of what those spoiled rich kids enjoyed doing to poor people not unlike himself. In any case, all he can do is keep running and hope for the best...

..."Well, I think he's taken notice of me", Valerie giggles to herself.

The ants are really starting to gain on this poor stranger. Valerie finds the idea of acting very enticing, but it might be interesting to see if this guy has any of those proverbial tricks up his sleeve...
1211.title: Valerie moves in for a closer look.

choices: He would rather risk death than beg for her help.
12112.content:
The boy ran from the giant girl like his life depended on it. What he didn't know was that he ran straight towards the ant mound. The girl looked curiously and somewhat concerned at the boy as the ants surrounded him. He was in too much of a panic to notice until he almost ran right into the lead ant.

The boy manages to take out one of them, before pulling a sword - more like a toothpick to the girl. With the sword two more are gone, but it gets stuck in a carcass, leaving him helpless as the other three advance on him.

"Do you need some help down there?" Valerie asks suggestively. She had been watching the whole incident curiously. He had put up a strong fight, and she wasn't interested in seeing him killed.

He looked at her with utter terror. Ants he was used to, but a giant rich girl almost causes him to panic. What does he do?
12112.title: Out of the Pot

choices: She respects and continues to watch.
121122.content:
Jimmy turns to Valerie, gives her a respectable bow, as if to say, "Thanks but no thanks," and turns to attack the remaining three ants. It's best to avoid rich girls, and especially never in debt yourself to them. Valerie giggles at the chivalry of this tiny person in front of her.


He lunges at the ant right in front of him with his sword. Tackling and pinning it to the ground. In response the other two ants scatter and circle back from two different sides, surrounding him. One gets frustrating close as he provides the finishing swipe to the current ant's head. He beheads it just in time to react to this advancing ant. He backs away instinctively, not realizing that he is backing right into the other ant. It bumps into him from behind causing him to knock over the sword.

Valerie concludes that all hope is likely lost for him. What does she do?
121122.title: Three on One

choices: She puts him right onto the mouth of the ant pile to test that theory.
She decides to collect a few ants to see later how many he could take.
1211221.content:
Jimmy braces for the ant to leap on top of him, but instead he feels a whoosh as a giant pillar falls right in front of him. It was the girl's index finger, who nonchalantly crushed the ant. She then scoops him up with her other hand and drops him onto her palm.

"You had a tough break there," she states. "Aren't you glad that I was here to protect you at the last minute?"

"What are you talking about," Jimmy replies. "I totally had both of them."

"Oh really..." she murmurs.

"I could have taken several dozen of them, without my sword," he answers. "I take on ants all the time."
1211221.title: Undesired Salvation

choices: She is going home with him since she's never met a tiny person before.
She's going to a snazzier part of the park for big people with him.
Realizing that he doesn't want to go with him, she decides to set him back down.
12112212.content:
"Oh sure," she replies as she sits up and begins to walk away.

"Wait," he protests when he realizes that she's walking somewhere. "Where are you going?"

"Well that was entertaining, but I figured there are most interesting places than this grassy field."

This "grassy field" was his home, flat and safe from unsuspecting large threats (like her) and full of food to scavenge.

"Why are you taking me?"

How does she answer?
12112212.title: She begins to walk away with him.

choices: He manages to grab his sword to lounge a counterattack.
He lands on top of the ant's back.
1211223.content:
Slightly bored at the predictability of the current outcome, she suddenly slams her open palm inches from the ants and the boy. The air shock knocks them suddenly and causes a ripple of direct to completely change the situation.

This worked perfectly for her amusement. The ant that was on top of Jimmy gets pushed back in the resulting groundslide, completely changing the fight. How does it affect Jimmy?
1211223.title: Chaos to Change the Battle

choices: Jimmy and the ant get away.
They encounter someone else (like her mom, her sister, or another rich friend).
12112233.content:
The mudslide engulfs Jimmy, and the ant. His spins and darkens as he becomes buried in an avalanche of dirt. He manages to dig himself out and find his sword. The rich girl from above is beaming with delight, entertained at her turn of events and delighted that he made it. His stomach contorts at the thought that her impulsive whim could have killed him.

He tries to shout angrily at her to leave him alone, but before he can, the ground underneath him quakes. The ant is also digging itself out of the wreckage and happens to be directly below him. The ground shifts as the ant unknowingly raises itself right underneath him. He finds himself riding its torso as its legs scurry about its business, and he instinctively holds on.

Its back legs try to push him off but can’t. He climbs to the top of the head and presses on. Victoria at this point is laughing in glee.

“Oh, that’s adorable,” she shouts, forgetting how loud her voice normally is to small ears. “I just have to keep you now.”

She reaches her hand down to grab Jimmy and the ant, but the ant instinctively dodges the threat. Afraid what else this giant girl would do to him, he kicks the back of the ant to stir it to action, like one would a horse. It responds in kind and charges underneath Victoria and behind her. The ant does not like that it has a rider but focuses on the more immediate threat from above, and Jimmy does as well. Victoria turns around to find him again.
12112233.title: The Ant-Rider

choices: She takes him to some friends to show his ant-riding skills.
She wants to see what other animals he can outsmart like that.
121122331.content:
Jimmy notices her shadow come upon them one more time. This time, she places a twig on top of the ant’s hind legs trapping it and reaches to grab onto Jimmy. Before he can respond, two fingers wrap around his torso and hoist him into the air. A third finger brushes off his little sword as if it were a toothpick. Jimmy couldn’t see that she grabbed it with her other hand and pocketed it for safe-keeping.

She drops him onto her other palm and brings him to her face. He looked in horror at the giant girl in front of him. He had horror many stories, where this was the end for people like him.

“Hello, I don’t think I officially introduced myself,” she brakes the silence with. “My name is Victoria.”

Jimmy stands there, too afraid to talk.

After a few seconds Victoria tries to soothe, unaware how piercing her voice is for him: “Not the talkative type I see. Well, riding an ant like that was really impressive. Plus, you’re little escapades have shown me that you’re not exactly safe in this grass alone. I can’t leave you alone like this. When you’re ready, I would love to learn a little more about you. I’d love to see what other tricks you have on your sleave. You’re going to love my home.”

Keeping Jimmy in her open palm, Victoria begins to walk away. Where does she go?
121122331.title: She gets him

choices: Jimmy makes a break for it.
12113.content:
Sharp, precise pain blazes from Jimmy's ankles to his inner thighs. A damning mixture of sweat and dirt seep into his wide green eyes. The relief carried by the winds above was blockaded by the towering blades of green which also effectively impeaded Jimmy's path. Desperation collides with physical limitations. Jimmy commands his legs to continue their journey, but they simply refuse to obey. Catapulted forward by his momentum, Jimmy's face slams unforgivingly into the brown gravel below. Unable to think or act, all Jimmy could do was wait for his gruesome demise...

"Uh oh, he fell", Valerie notes mentally. "I guess it's now or never".

Valerie's hand had been forced, not only in the figurative sense either. Playfully mimicing the monotone beeping of heavy machinery, Valerie slips her right hand smoothly out from under her chin, leaving a patch of condensation in its stead. Valerie's slender fingers act as one as they cup slightly opposite her thumb. Valerie then inverts the position of her hand, completing the illusion. "The crane" cautiously, yet swiftly adjusts its position to hover directly over its target. Valerie's thumb and index finger part just enough to fit in its cargo. Then, in perfect pully system fashion, Valerie's craddled hand dropped straight downward with great speed and secured its haul. With the ants less than an inch away, the boy is hoisted toward the heavens and into safety.

Having secured the stranger successfully, Valerie wishes to examine her catch. Valerie flips her hand back to its starting point and flattened her appendages, leaving the boy exposed on her open palm. Moving her hand and its rider toward her face, Valerie gets her first good look at a member of a different social class.

The boy was covered in sod. He was no taller than one-third of Valerie's middle finger. His ripped clothes could only be described as ragged. His out of control neck length hair was full, and his bangs droup most of the way down his forehead. What really catches Valerie's attention, however, is the look of bewilderment occupying the boy's face.

"I wonder what he's thinking right about now", Valerie wonders to herself...

Without warning, two olive totem poles surround Jimmy and engulf his frame. Though tightly grasped, Jimmy's new environment is actually quite snug. His body even makes a temporary indentation in his fleshy surroundings. Swift movement surprises Jimmy, but the gusts of fresh air slipping through the cracks of his cell make it a rather pleasent one. Suddenly Jimmy's world is turned upsidedown in the most literal of ways. Jimmy roles down a soft, but bumpy and rapidly declining slope to come a stop in a hilly land of pink. A strong breeze appears from no where, preventing Jimmy from rising to his feet. Jimmy is now face to body with an attractive female giant, and he quickly concludes that her intentions can't be good.
12113.title: Jimmy trips.

121132.content:
From his sitting position on the lushly flexible palm, the vast twins of bejeweled cyan staring at him compete for the attention of Jimmy's helpless gaze. The heels of his worn loafers skid forward desperately against ductile landing, creating much friction for his dragging backside. Soon realizing that such action is an ineffective method of travel, Jimmy, in a single movement, pushes off from the plush landscape while rotating his body 180 degrees. Before he can even stand, he sprints straight ahead and away from the beautifully frightening visage studying him so intently.

Once he rushes to the edge of the loosely aligned bridge of coral-wrapped phalanges, Jimmy glances beyond pink delineated tips to the dark green forest below. Through the monotonous sea of blades, he makes out the outlines of the five persistent predators previously giving him chase scampering about in random search. Jimmy was hoping that they would have wandered off by now, allowing him a less treacherous escape route after making his death-defying leap, but to no avail. Jimmy scrapes his brain for alternatives as he stands frozen at the outer frontier of a wealthy girl's hand.

"Are they still bothering you?", Valerie breaks the silent tension.

Her left hand acts on cue with Valerie's words, leaving its chin supporting state in a falling motion. Its metacarpus is revealed as Valerie's tall digits extend flatly in merged unison. Gaining velocity, the demolishing appendage zips at a declining angle toward the unknowing insects. In an impressive instant, it slams carelessly into the general vicinity of Jimmy's former whereabouts, sending a clamorous thud into the air. The guilty palm wipes itself against a cleaner portion of the grassland before raising itself back to Valerie's face, opting to lean against her lightly blushed cheek this time. Jimmy glares in dumbfounded manner at the sight of the collision. The smushed grass and partially exposed dirt are all that is left; the ants appear to have been literally smashed into oblivion.

With a sense of pride in her voice, Valerie asks, "Better?".

"...", Jimmy is rendered speechless.

"You don't need to jump, you know", Valerie seems to have read Jimmy's mind, "Besides, the fall would probably kill you".

Jimmy turns to face the looming giantess, "And if I stay up here?".

"Stick with me and you'll be fine", Valerie assures with a warm smile, "It's a lot safer up here. By the way, you do know you're in upper class territory, right? Why would you come all the way out here? It's way too dangerous for someone like you".

Jimmy isn't sure whether or not to trust the giantess holding him in her palm.
121132.title: A swift extermination

choices: Valerie intends to take care of Jimmy
1211321.content:
Jimmy doesn't want to trust the giant vixen before him, but he just can't help it. Those dainty cardinal-glossed lips forming such a gentle smirk couldn't possibly spout lies, could they? The pureness emanating from those azure orbs also serves to soothe the uneasy boy. As renegade fibers of Valerie's bountiful sangria hair glide with the slight breeze across her gorgeously intrigued countenance, Jimmy decides to be truthful despite his better judgment.

"I came for money", Jimmy announces casually.

"That's so stupid!", Valeria scolds in a concerned tone, "Is money worth your life?!".

Jimmy gives a bitter chuckle before answering, "It's worth putting food in the stomachs of my eight brothers and sisters. It's worth keeping my mother from having to work eighteen hour days just so we can keep that run down single room apartment we call home. It's worth finally being able to give my starved father's lifeless body a hole to be buried in proper-like. So yeah, I guess it's worth my life, too".

"I'm sorry", tears begin to well in Valerie's eyes, "I didn't think...".

Valerie's sympathy catches Jimmy off guard. With all he had heard of the giants, they weren't supposed to be so understanding. His heart yearns to reciprocate such kindness as droplets of water start to work their way over Valerie's subtle cheekbones.

"Don't worry about it", Jimmy laughs nervously, "I can be a real drama queen sometimes. Oh, thanks for saving me. I don't think I did that yet".

"You're welcome", Valerie's expression returned to its normal beaming formation, "I'm Valerie, but I like Val better".

"I go by Jimmy", the boy introduces himself.

"It's nice to meet you, Jimmy", Valerie chirps, "So, Jimmy, how exactly were you going to get that much needed cash?".

"Well, Val", Jimmy explains, "I haven't quite figured that out, yet. You've heard of Jack and the Beanstalk, right?".

"That old story?", Valerie questions, "Sure, what about it?".

"It may be just an old story to you", Jimmy informs his gargantuan new friend, "But it's more like a legend where I'm from. A dream, really. I always pretended I was Jack when I was a kid; bravely venturing into a new land, stealing the golden goose and saving my family, killing a gi...".

Jimmy pauses as he realizes his mistake. Surely all the goodwill between Valerie and himself has lost all meaning in his admission of murderous fantasies. He expected her crushing fingers to come for him in a fit of anger, but they never do. Instead, he is shocked to see Valerie lower her head in shame.

"It's okay", Valerie says sadly, "I know we're a bunch of jerks".

"Val", Jimmy is taken aback by Valerie's statement.

"But we're not all that way", Valerie's head pops back up with a look of determination, "I'll show you, if you'll let me".

"What do you have in mind?", Jimmy's curiosity is piqued.
1211321.title: The skinny on Jimmy

choices: Jimmy is in a fancy restaurant
12113212.content:
A shy grin crosses Valerie's gigantic face. In an obvious tactic in hesitation, the enormous girl switches her position. Her body raises from the ground, her boundless dark salmon legs slide along the helpless bundles of grass, unknowingly tearing several blades from the soil. The lengthy appendages slip in front of Valerie's upper body, stretching themselves to their full length as she sits. She lifts her hand, carrying Jimmy with it, to her visage's newly elevated position.

"I was thinking you could come and live with me", Valerie offers nervously.

Jimmy replies in a startled voice, "What are you saying?! I'd be your pet?!"

"No!", Valerie denies, "Well, yeah, kinda. But it's not like I would order you around or make you do tricks. Just hear me out".

Valerie moves her hand down, setting it on her lap. Jimmy takes the hint, and steps onto the warm surface of her leg. He takes in his new surroundings in awe. Directly in front of him is a building of pure whiteness, save for the sploshes of green stained onto the cotton wall. At its base, a great expanse of cerulean covers about half of Valerie's thigh, its ridged edge craggy. In the opposite direction, down the elongated parallel expanses of exposed flesh, stand no less parallel roadblocks of tan wrapped in leather straps, ten wiggling toes with nails glazed in lavender between them.

"Now", Valerie begins, "You've had such a hard life, much harder than you deserve. I, on the other hand, have spent my entire life in luxury. Don't you think it's time you caught a break? Wouldn't it be nice if someone was looking out for you for a change? I can make that happen".

"It's not that simple, Val", Jimmy shouts to be heard, "What about my family?".

"Wouldn't they be happy if you got a taste of the good life?", Valerie counters.

"I guess", Jimmy acknowledges begrudgingly, "But I can't ask you to...".

"Sure you can", Valerie interrupts with her much louder voice, "Actually, I really want you to come with me. After spending most of my life around those snobs, it'd be nice to hang around a real person for a change".

"I don't really have a choice, do I?", Jimmy realizes.

"Not really", Valerie confirms, "But I'd feel a lot better about it if you'd agree".

Jimmy starts to pace; he always paces when he thinks. Should he try to escape? Does he really want to escape? The thought of Valerie looking after him isn't exactly an unappealing prospect for Jimmy. It's not like his family really needs him, either. Actually, all his disappearance would equate to is one less mouth to feed. Perhaps this isn't such a bad idea after all.

"Um, where are you going?", Valerie giggles as she speaks.

Jimmy looks around. He's moved a considerable distance further down Valerie's glassy right leg. Standing on the top portion of her shin, Jimmy wonders how he missed stepping over that bulging knee cap. He starts on his long trek back to Valerie's lap.

"Sorry about that", Jimmy apologizes in an embarrassed tone.

Valerie smirks down on Jimmy, "It's okay. Your feet tickled".

"Anyway", Jimmy tries to change the subject, "I've decided to go with you, if you don't mind".

"Great", Valerie seems giddy, "Well, let's go".

With that, Valerie's dainty right hand scoops up Jimmy with relative ease. Jimmy glances at Valerie's glamorous smile one last time before her prodigious fingers close in around him. Enveloped in complete darkness, Jimmy finds his confines surprisingly comfortable. He kicks back against the malleable enclosure and lets his tiredness drift him to slumber.

"Hey!", A sweet, but voluminous voice awakens the sleeping boy, "Are you alright?".

Jimmy sits up at the question, "Yeah, I was just taking a nap. It was pretty snug in there".

"Thanks", Valerie beams, "It's time to get up, though. We're here".

Jimmy's neck swivels in an effort to discover just where "here" is.
12113212.title: On to a new life?

choices: There is a knock on the door.
121132121.content:
Jimmy was in Valerie's room now, on her bed to more precise. Valerie's room could house an entire city of poor people. " Your room is huge." said Jimmy, on his back. 122.content:
Valerie was sitting on a bench in the park, deep in thought. As she was busy thinking, she noticed something out of the corner of her eye: a group of three boys and two girls was being attacked by a crow! Being form a rich family, Valerie was able to maintain her full size of 5'9''. These people, however, were not so fortunate. They all appeared to be about 18 years old. They were a mixture of sizes, but none of them were taller than half a foot. One of the girls was about 3 inches tall, as was one of the boys. The other two boys were 4 inches and 2 inches respectively. The remaining girl was the tallest of them, standing at 5 inches tall. None of them, however, were any match for the foot tall bird.

Valerie immediately jumped to her feet and ran toward the scene. She began waving her arms and screaming to scare off the bird, and it took off shortly after noticing her... Unfortunately, it took the shirk off of the smallest boy's back along with it. The five teenagers now stood and stared in awe at the giantess who had just saved their lives. Valerie, on the other hand, quickly noticed that the crow had made off with the 2 inch boy's shirt. Reaching into her pocket, she pulled out a tissue and poked a hole into it with her finger. she then handed it down to the boy. He stared at her for another moment before accepting the tissue and putting it on like a poncho.

"Uhhh... Thank you, Miss..."

Valerie simply smiled at the boy.

"It was nothing. I couldn't just stand by and watch as some bird made a meal out of you guys, could I?"

"Well... Most people would have..."

"And that's because most people are complete idiots! If they had even a single shred of common sense, then they would know how important it is to help out those in need! Anyway, do you guys mind if I ask who you are?"

"Sure! I'm Jake. The two 3 inchers over there are Alex and his sister Michelle; they're twins, by the way. The 4 inch guy is my neighbor Chris. And our towering leader here is Queen Amy."

Amy walked over and gave Jake a quick bonk on the head.

"How many times have I told you not to call me that! That nickname got old a long time ago. Just give it a rest already, Jake..."

"Aw, but it fits you so well..."

"Kinda like how that new 'poncho' of yours fits you? I'm sorry Jake, but that thing looks like it's 5 sizes too big for you! And it's just a stinking tissue for Pete's sake!"

"Hey! It's not my fault that that stupid bird stole my shirt! Why if I were only a few inches taller, I'd-"

Amy then interrupted by placing her hand on Jake's chest and giving him a gentle shove backwards. He fell on his butt, and Amy simply giggled at him with a smirk on her face.

"You'd do what, little man?"

Getting to his feet again, Jake prepared to rush at Amy with a counterattack. Before he had the chance, however, Alex and Michelle got in between them and held them apart.

"Break it up, you two! Can't you go one day without starting an argument?!" Michelle said

"He started it!" Amy yelled

"I don't care who started it! This comedy routine of yours has gotten really old! Just drop it already!" Alex said

Valerie simply looked over to Chris, who was standing to the side and trying to tune the whole thing out.

"Are they always like this?" she asked

"Oh no, this is actually one of their more mild arguments... You should have seen them before the shrinking law was put into effect! Those two would go at each other like crazy! Things have gotten a bit more tame now that Amy has the size advantage, but Jake still just loves pressing her buttons..."

"So how long have you five known each other?"

"I met Jake about 4 years ago, when my family moved into the house next to his. Amy and Jake are childhood friends, and have known each other since preschool. As for the twins, I really don't know when they came into the picture. All I know is that they met the other two at some point in elementary school. The five of us have hung out together ever since we met."

"Wow... It must be nice to have friends like that... Ever since that stupid shrinking law came up 3 years ago, the only people that I can hang out with are total snobs!"

"Hmmm... Well, would you like to hang out with us then? I'm sure that the others are also grateful for you saving us. It would be nice to get to know you Miss."

"Miss? Why are you-Oh crap! I can't believe that I forgot to introduce myself! I'm sorry... My name is Valerie."

"Ah, well then... It's nice to meet you, Valerie!"

Chris then held out his hand to offer a handshake. Valerie smiled and used her index finger to shake hands with him. By this point, the other four had managed to sort out their argument. Amy and Jake stepped forward and looked up at Valerie.

"Sorry about that, Valerie... I guess that old habits are hard to break..." Amy said

"Oh, don't worry about it. I'm just glad that I was able to help you out."

"So, what are we gonna do now?" the twins asked

"Hmmm... How about _________."

The mistress reports that it is unsatisfactory in level of cleanliness. You will clean it by 2pm." said the butler before hanging up. Arif cursed his luck that he had to clean it now.

He boarded the transport and drove it towards the pool area which was outside and that would require some walking but fortunately it was all underground to avoid nasty accidents. The transport vehicle hummed as it sped towards the pool area which took him right beneath the pool and into a special area where he would get suited up for his task.

It was a fast trip and soon he was there. Arif got out into the entrance where he was forced to deposit his phone and stolen watch before entering. He saw a man whom he recognised as Robert, one of the men in charge of the pool. " So you will be cleaning the pool?" said Robert. " Yep." Arif said rather glumly, scratching his chin where he had grown a small goatee as part of his new look.

" Well you better be careful as the mistress or young Rita might be in the pool as we speak. Though I'd prefer young Rita, she is kind to the servants.' said Robert as both suited up for the job. " I find a kind giant hard to believe.' said Arif as they wore their special suits. Robert sighed before saying," You don't believe me because you are new but Rita will change your mind when you meet her." he said with a smile.

'I'd rather not.' Arif stated. Robert was those blindly optimistic guys he found annoying, many of them were disappointed in the end which meant he had a rough idea how Robert would die. He did not reveal to Robert why he hated giants, it was common for both middle class and poor to despise them and few actually asked why as it was a pointless question. Not that Arif would tell him why even if he bothered to ask, at most he would make up a reason.
1313.title: He has to clean the pool.

13132.content:
The vehicle Arif will use to clean the pool is a submarine like vehicle with a huge basket behind it. ' So this is what we'll be using to clean the pool?" he asked Robert who nodded The door opens as Robert pushes a button on a remote in his hand and they enter, ready to enter the pool. The door closes as they sit in the two seats, Robert as the pilot and Arif would be in charge of picking up the leaves and any junk in the pool.

Robert switches on the engine and it hums as the room they were once in begins to flood as the pool water enters it, " Amazing what the rich get.' Arif says as he is amazed at all this. ' You get used to it, I see someone is using the pool." said Robert, noting the dark outline of a human on the surface of the pool, kicking about as she swims.

" I think we should tell her we are cleaning the pool since one kick might send us crashing to the bottom of this pool." Arif notes. " Good point.' said Robert, who picks up a walkie-talkie and speaks into it. ' Excuse me mistress but we have to clean the pool so could you please stop swimming so you don't kill us?" he says in a happy voice. Arif rolled his eyes at this.

He thought it was stupid of him to ask his employer to stop but then the reply came which changed all that, " Sure, come up so I can see you." said the female voice. " Now you'll meet Rita." he said, Arif thought to himself he'd rather not. But the submarine was already rising and he would to live with it, he was one of the lowest ranking servants since he had just joined them.

The submarine floated to the top and the hatch began to unscrew as Robert was eager to meet Rita, " I'd rather stay in.' said Arif, not relishing this. " I can see you, so come on out!" a sweet voice said. Robert came out followed by Arif. Arif saw a pair of huge breasts covered by a pink material, or rather barely covered as they seemed a size smaller.

'Hello Rita!" said Robert. ' Hi Robert and you must be Karim, Dad hired you last week!' the giantess teenager said.

" So you'll be cleaning the pool?" she asked them. " Oh yes, the butler asked us to do it." said Robert with that ever present smile on his face. Karim was one of his favourite names to use and he a few others incase things didn't go well for this one. " He doesn't like giants."said Robert. Rita frowned at this. " Why little man?' she teased him, much to the chagrin of Arif. " I don't think it is possible for giants to treat the smaller ones with kindness." said Arif.

Rita thought for awhile before saying," I'll prove you wrong. "she said,setting the boat down in the water. ' What are you going to do?" Robert asked Rita. ' I'm going to help you clean the pool." she said, wading to the other side. " You take one half of the pool, I'll take the other!" said Rita. Robert and Arif got back in, Robert was happy Rita was helping out.

' See? She is a good person." Robert said to Arif. " So it would seem...at the moment." he added, still not fully convinced. They began to do their, using the arms of the vehicle to pick up leaves and the occasional cigarette butt left behind by their employer's girlfriend, she was either inside sleeping or outside spending lots of money or partying.

Arif saw Rita, wading about the pool to pick up any trash she found, he could only see her back and her butt covered by a thong that did not really cover anything but showed her round and curvy butt.

Arif watched as the movers( people like him as in their size), Arif was making everything was in place. " Now are the rest of the gang in place?" Arif asked his man on the other end of the line. " Yeah, we've got a good view of the place from where we are." said the man whom Arif did not know by name, some members he did not know but he knew a good few that he depended on.

The gang was stationed right under the house in a make shift hideout where they would be ready to strike at any moment. Arif and a few others were undercover doing different jobs around the house. Arif had an important job as the new butler, he was never one but had forged letters and testimonials to claim otherwise.

Reynard was a runner for the kitchen where he would be able to work out the tunnels that the servants would travel in and also he would be able to listen in on conversations during meals between the family. It was a very small family, just the father Richard and his younger teenage daughter Vanessa. Apparently the mother died or something, or so Arif told him.

The other spy was Didier, one of the gardeners. He would be able to check who went in and out of the house. Despite Arif being the head butler, he would need people to cover as much of the house as possible. Sometimes rich people don't tell their servants everything and he wanted to know about these thngs so he could plan the time and date of execution of his plan.

1321.content:
Arif walked into the house via the front door despite the risk of getting stepped on but the family wasn't particularly big for giants, Vanessa was about 80 feet tall while father Richard was about 85 feet tall. He saw many of the servants running around, aiming to get everything ready while huge helicopters were moving the furniture around as Richard had told the movers.

He saw the door of the room ajar and he heard voices from the room which he assumed had to be Richard and Vanessa talking. " Dad I'm not used to this.' he heard Vanessa say. Arif stood outside, back against the wall and pretended to be organising the schedule while eavesdropping on them. " Don't worry, I know you aren't used to us living well and that I'll be away for days because of my job but it is what keeps you safe and I'll try to take time off to spend with you. Alright?" he said.

Arif felt the ground shake as Richard left the room followed by Vanessa who felt over him. ' You must be our new butler." she said to him. Arif looked up and saw Vanessa looking down at him, she was a brunette with brown eyes and long hair that came down past her shoulders. " I am." replied Arif.
" I'm not used to being this big." said Vanessa.

Arif felt compelled to ask why. " Why is that Miss?" he asked her. ' Well we only became rich a year ago when my dad's company went public and he made millions over the course of a few months." she said to him. " So you were what-middle class like me?" he asked her. She nodded. " I was once your size, it's so surreal to be able to look down at you because I'm so big." she added.

Arif felt the ground shake and he figured it was either Richard or Vanessa stepping out of the house. Didier looked at him before going off to do his own thing as the rumblings got louder. He felt a foot hit the ground behind him so he turned around to see who it was. He saw Vanessa, her sneakers right infront of him. " That was a little close don't you think?" he said to her.

Vanessa giggled, " I hope you're right about me, I get to make some new friends." said Vanessa. " Well if it is one thing I know, it is that you can always find friends no matter where you go." said Arif, which was a lie since he didn't really have any friends given the kind of work he was in. Arif was at home in his apartment on the outskirts of town, his area seperated from the rich by a huge fence that marked the boundary between him and the rich. He was not poor, calling him would be to send 80% of the world into poverty but he was not rich either. He had a window where he could see the houses of the rich.

Tell him we agree and I will be there personally to meet him when we do meet.' said Arif. " Ok, see you soon Arif. " said Hector.

In here, Arif was king of the underworld. Few men would dare cross him and the police even came to him from time to time when they needed leads. In return for immunity, Arif would help out unless it got too messy at which point he would claim he knew nothing. He switched on the television where they were talking about some rich girl's new house or something, Arif only saw them as victim, victim, bigger victim...

14.content:
Vera Mueller was one of the lucky ones in the size-changed world of the future. She had married a wealthy man just a few years before the laws were put in place, and soon after she divorced him and took all of his money - including his business. She will never forget the divorce proceedings and how her husband broke down to tears when the judge awrded everything to her. The poor man cursed her name as he was hauled away to be shrunken down to reflect his new poverty status.

Sometimes she wondered what ever became of him, but she didn't feel the least bit of pity. She only married him for his money, and thanks to that she had managed to save herself from being reduced in size. Furthermore, he know had this thriving business under her iron grip. This business practically ran itself, but she loved exercising her power now and then. In fact, this moment seemed like a perfect time to push someone around and be a real bitch.

The 28 year old blonde kicked off her pumps and placed her nylon covered feet on her desk. Next, she pushed a button on her chair which activated the office intercom. "Hello Heidi, could you have Richard meet me in my office, please?" Vera said into the intercom. She waiting a few minutes, and soon enough a tiny poor on the wall opened and a miniature man reluctantly walked through and onto her desk. Vera smiled at him. "Hello, Richard. I have been meaning to talk to you about your performance at this company..."

The tiny man didn't like where this was going. His knees started to tremble as he stood there next to her towering nylon feet. "Please, don't reduce my salary any further! I have a wife and children! I can't afford to be shrunk any further. I beg you!" He shouted, and fell to his knees.

Vera loved when her tiny employees groveled at her feet like this. "I'm sorry Richard. As you know, a company is only as strong as it's weakest member. Your performance has been consistently terrible despite my repeated warnings. Now, is there anything you can offer to this company that would justify your continued presence her?" Vera cleared her throat and pointed to her massive feet.

Richard had a good idea of what she meant so he crawled over to her musky feet and began kissing and rubbing them for all he was worth. As he did this, he groveled and begged for her not to fire him. This made Vera feel aroused.

After a few minutes of Richard worshiping and kissing her sweaty feet, Vera made her decision. "Okay, Richard. I will give you one more chance, but this is your last. Do you understand?" The tiny man nodded frantically in agreement. "Good. Now go back to your cubicle and remember that if there is no improvement you will be fired."

And with that, the tiny man went back through the door in the wall. Vera wanted to push some more people around, so she spoke to her secretary, Heidi, on the intercom again and told her to....

14111.content:
She giggled as she felt the poor man's tongue squirm against her foot. Her foot bobbed up and down playfully, unable to control itself. She couldn't imagine what it was like to be him, desperately trying to lick her foot as it keeps knocking him over.

"That's enough," she said after twenty minutes. She had made her point. She now only needed to provide one final incentive. He stopped as she grabbed him between her toes and brought him up to her desk. After dropping him, she kept her feet within a menacing close distance from his form. He fell down panting for breath.

"I heard you have a wife and two daughters," she beckoned. "Call them and have them brought here."

"My family, what could you possibly want with them?!" he exclaimed.

"Don't you dare talk back to me," she scolded. Her big toe swiftly moved in on him from behind and knocked him face first into the ground. He laid there with the wind knocked out of him. "You're in enough trouble is it is. Now use your phone and call your wife, while I make a call for your daughters at school."

He told his wife to come immediately as she talked with the principal. The principal was slightly bigger but only six inches to her. She funded the school and had him wrapped around her finger, or oftentimes her toes. He brought the girls without hesitation. Within five minutes, his whole family was standing on her desk as she simply sat there with her feet on her desk on either side of them. The monstrous were reminders of her power of their lives.

"You're daddy hasn't been performing very well," she explained, in a childlike voice, belittling the girls who were 14 and 16. She knew she didn't have to talk to them like that, but it reinforced their diminished state. "So I am going to keep you three as personal servants until he does better. You'll have to pay back for the money owed for his lack of productivity. Think of it as an incentive of sorts."

"No!!!" the man screamed, as her hand reached and grabbed his wife and two daughters. He lunged for him, but she simply landed her other hand in between them. He just wound up running into her palm.

"No back to work before I change my mind and fire you!" she said flicking him onto the ground. "And you know how long fired people and their families usually last don't you." Her face smiled as he screamed in horror. Fired employees rarely survived the day as her toys. She then simply walked away with her prize of three women leaving the man to go back to his office building himself.

"Oh well, actually you killed him", Vera sayed with a smile in her pretty face." Sofia looked a little bit puzzled but Vera explained quickly. "I simply forgott about him as I heard you where coming" "Oh well, this little fucks are good for nothing anyways - They just produce problems... which leads me to the reason of my visit." "Whats up girl, what are you so concerned about?" "I am not really good in law things and I hope you could help me..." "What is it, sis?" "I have bought some ground at the shore of germany, Near Duesseldorf well, it is almost the complete city. My lawyers have settled most of the things but now I found out that I can not build there. I wanted to have a nice weekend estate there. Since the flood the climate there is really nice and so but the Kilos are making problems." "Kilos? They aren't bigger than... let me think. An inch?" "Yeah, the very big ones maybe. The council sayed that that is a Kilo zone now and that I am just allowed to build in their size." "That is shit but no problem at all" Sofias face brightened up immediatly. "It is the same stupid law that forces you too build service tunnels in your house so the servants can move without beeing trodden on." "Oh yeah, that had cost me a lot." "Not only you, but it is not sayed where and how long they have to be. I have just installed one in the garden, not even a foot in length and that is ok." Vera smiled. "I have saved at least a couple of hundredthousand credits. It is still easier and cheaper to get a new servant even if you insure his family in case of death." "Wow. How often does that happen?" Vera flicked through the folder. The CEO wanted to talk. "Heidi? When do we take control of Anderson?"

"Wednesday."

"This is going to be a public relations disaster!"

It was three days later and with time to kill before the takeover went through, Vera had made plans for the demolition of a company owned housing estate near one of her shoe factories. It was going to be a glitzy event with all her friends, anybody whom she thought was anybody and the media. But first was the inevitable P.R. meeting. So here she was.In a board room with a cold strip light and a wall length window with a view she was bored of and a gaggle of annoying people in cheaper suits than hers.

The shrill voice belonged to Anna Horowitz, her six inch tall head of P.R.. (That was smaller than other companiy's P.R. heads but Vera despised wasteful expenditure. She got value.)

Vera sat forward in her huge chair, her feet resting on the conference table and rolled her eyes. "I take a simple job and turn it into a star studded media event with a message about how Mueller International are blazing the trail in economic recovery with our efficiency and you are unhappy. I thought you'd be pleased, but you are playing Cassandra! Please, enlighten us all as to why you believe this will not be a big success."

Miss Horowitz squirmed uncomfortably. She was at least twice as big as any of the other P.R. people present, but very small compared to Vera Mueller and she was all too aware of thow dangerous it was to anger her... or to fail her. She was in a no-win situation. She fidgeted with her glasses.

"With respect, while this, on many levels would seem to be a positive boon to Mueller International, there is the fact that over a thousand workers and their families (including cute photogenic children) have been evicted from their homes with only a few days notice. They don't have the means to move their possessions and they are expected to live in a shanty town..."

"Camp."

"The media could easily call it a shanty town, or if we get really unlucky 'refugee camp'. And furthermore they will have to watch their homes being destroyed by..."

"It's not as though their tacky furniture and flying duck decorations would be the right size once they've been reduced anyway. They should be greatful that Mueller is providing for them."

"Yes!" All heads turned. It was Susann Kruger. The three inch tall woman flipped her brunette hair and addressed Vera directly.

"I like it. We spin it that redundancies were inevitable due to..."

"The current economic crisis" recited everyone.

"...but that we Mueller has shown the way, by not only safeguarding jobs and building new affordable housing..." She was really on a roll now., "...that uses up less space, thus helping to alliviate the housing crisis, but doing so with the sense of joy and verve which we all associate with..." She ran out of steam.

"Taking a nice long shit?" finished Anna, sourly.

Vera clapped her hands and addressed the group. "Susann, I like your thinking. Work on the ending and we'll do lunch. Time is of the essence. So be at Vistro Canoreum at 1PM sharp. That's today.

"Anna, your lack of vision disappoints me. I don't pay you to tell me what the media might say; I pay you to tell them what I want them to say. Be in my office this afternoon. Arrange an appointment."

Anna's face fell and other people either looked pittyingly at her or averted their eyes. She was going to be demoted at best and everyone knew what that meant.

It meant nothing to Vera.

Vera and Sofia were in a passionate embrace, turned on by such lust and desire that that they had destroyed everything that they had each owned and built up (and much else besides but at that size that didn't matter to them) in extravagant passion and desire, when it started happening, Vera was rubbing the remains of a crushed village over Sofia's leather clad body when she noticed something the debris was getting bigger. "Wha.....wha.....what the %^*&'s happening!?", exclaimed Vera suddenly getting up dropping the debris and crashing into a nearby already crushed city. "What's the matter, babe?" responded Sofia lazily not quite comprehending. "Get up and see...", said Vera, almost panicking. Sofia stood up and gloved hands on hips looked across at Vera who was turning her gloved hands this way and that. "Look........we're.........shrinking.....". Sofia suddenly grasped the situation...."&*(^!". Down and down they went. "I suppose smashing all our stuff wasn't such a good idea", ventured Vera hesitatingly, a way of speaking unknown to her. Sofia sensed this, she had never totally seen that side of her friend Vera...."but it was fun though.....and we still have each other", she smiled. Vera smiled...."yes, that's true..." and gave Sofia a big kiss, "you're so adorable"............."but what are we going to do? What if we shrink to the size of those.....ants........below us........what are they going to do to us?" "Don't worry, baby, we do have each other, anyway we didn't leave many survivors, did we?" Sofia giggled.

Meanwhile their 24000ft, became 12000, then 6000, then 3000, 2000, 1000, 500.............and then stopped..........how come?
14513222111212122112211.title: Continuation 1 (reserved)

145132221112121221122111.content:
Suddenly they stopped shrinking........Vera and Sofia were puzzled if not a little relieved that they won't sink to any level after all. They had destroyed everything each of them owned and much else besides in their lust with the inevitable shrinking consequences. Or had they? As Vera and Sofia lay there in each other's arms comforting each other the answer to their question came soon enough. BOOM! BOOM! BOOM!....the sound of footsteps, giant footsteps.........GIANT footsteps, for the first time in a while Vera was a little afraid, as was Sofia. They looked round........Sofia particularly was open mouthed, "errrrr hi".......Vera said to Sofia, "do you know these people?". "These are my cousins Amy and Ally"..."and this our friend Anna", Amy and Ally answered pointing to the 3rd girl. All three of them stood there, 500ft tall, all suntan, blonde hair, gold jewellery, and stunning, tightly clothed figures. Amy, hands on slim tight jean clad hips spoke again: "what the &^*%'s been going on here? Everything's trashed and you are.....so short.......Vera hugged her for support.....Ally spoke: "Vera?........". The 2 not long ago unstoppable giantesses suddenly were acting like rabbits in headlights...."wha...? You 2 are together?"....Sofia nodded her head eagerly....."I wondered if that would happen, all the things you said about her.......". Vera looked round at Sofia and they smiled at each other. Ally looked around at destruction as far as the eye could see and continued: "wow, you must have had some fun!", she said with a smile. "Yeah! we destroyed everything didn't we, baby? And all my lands as well......". The 3 visitors were dumbfounded.......acquiring wealth and abusing the land and its inhabitants were Vera and lately Sofia's main purpose in life now gratuitously smashed. "We're here to bring you some news, we couldn't get through on your phone, Sofia........."......"yeah, that was a real turn on when your boot crashed down on it Sofia", ventured Vera......"in the circumstances it looks very good news", said Ally. Vera and Sofia perked up visibly. Sofia, you know the money you leant us to get ourselves on the wealth ladder? Well we wanted to say we have now paid it back and with interest, we deposited 100 billion credits in your bank today......"how come you didn't mention this?", said Vera. Sofia looked a little sheepish: "I completely forgot, I have....er had tinies to look after my wealth, I can't remember everything, lol". "Well, you saved my life, baby.......". Vera kissed.Sofia full on the lips. Sofia continued on the loan repayment: "so that's why we didn't shrink further, and since we are now an item, aren't we baby?", they kissed each other on the lips again, "and that's why we both stopped shrinking". Excited now they held each other and jumped up and down like excited teenagers, pummelling further the shattered landscape. Ally, Amy and Anna smiled, "they look happy", said Amy "let's leave them to it" and they started walking back to their lands. Sofia noticed and shouted out "thanks sooooooo much, girls, when we build up our wealth again, I'll remember this". The 3 turned round and faced Vera and Sofia and they all said their goodbyes......

The 2 of them relaxed again in each others arms....."are you thinking what I am thinking, darling?" said Vera, "there's a whole lot more world out there to conquer and plunder and make us even richer than we were before, and this time we're doing it together"........"Yeah, let's do it....." replied Sofia, stretching out and catching a couple of news helicopters that had strayed too far and crushing them let the bits trickle down on Vera's front....."and do some more rampages as well......."."that's my girl", said Vera.........
145132221112121221122111.title: Continuation 1 (reserved)

1451322211121212211221112.content:
The next day the 2 of them woke up in each other's arms, they were naked except for the copious amounts of jewellery both wore, their outfits were strewn around the landscape, there were fresh craters, there was a huge lake of pee, and there was cum stuck to some of the ruins beneath their bodies.

"That was sooooo good, baby", said Vera lazily to Sofia, who was now cradling her in her arms. The great and feared Vera was now submitting herself to another being. "Mmmmm!" was all Sofia could say as she looked into Vera's face and kissed her deeply.......
1451322211121212211221112.title: Next day.........

145132221112121222.content:
Vera moved on to the next city that lay ahead. It was a big city. Well, it had a large population at any rate. In the scheme of things, this was actually one of the wealthier cities in the region. The people here enjoyed above average stature and were feared by other citizens. But they didn't even begin to compare to Vera. They Knew she was coming. There was no media announcement, no appointment. The earth simply began to tremble beneath the feet of everyone in the city. Far off passed the suburbs a towering figure drew near, accompanied by the low booming of immense, slow, deliberate footsteps. Soon Vera was among the houses on the outskirts. entire homes, four and five at a time disappeared under the soles of her boots. She paid no mind, or at least she pretended to. The fact that she seemed indifferent to destroying the homes and lives the people literally beneath her, added to her aura of cruelty. She was NOT a governess to be crossed. Soon the buildings grew a bit taller around her boots. But they smashed just the same. A little smirk crept on to her face as she could just make out the little people scurrying for their lives.
Near the "high rise" buildings of downtown, she addressed the city. Everyone, no one in particular.
"Well folks, you had a good run, times have been good for you and your city has been spared much of the financial pain that others have had to endure. But unfortunately, I have to a impose a retroactive, tax on every person, organization, and business in this city. Ninety percent of all funds in any bank account above 100 credits is going to turned over to the government, immediately."
As if on cue, the city began to dwindle around Vera. Skyscrapers that were even with her chest now stood at her waist, then her knees, then ankles. When all the funds were transferred, the tallest buildings barely challenged her the heels of her boots, and most didn't even reach above the sole.
"You're sacrifice is much appreciated."

choices: She came back after all to destroy them all.

1451322211121212221.content: Callously wiping her booted feet on more suburbs she turned tail and went off and the surviving people in the partly ruined city breathed a sigh of relief. They had been badly crushed but not fatally destroyed, they could rebuild, they have done it before. They were troubled however, over and above the trauma they had already suffered. Why hadn't she completely ground them to dust, after all she had done it to so many other cities after extracting huge parts of their wealth. Maybe she actually underneath it all had a grudging admiration for their wealth generating skills which they showed even in a difficult climate like the present...........
1451322211121212221.title: Vera Leaves

1451322211121212222.content:
She hadn't done yet. Having taken most of their money and grown to an immense height she put her gloved hands on her hips and with a smirk that looked quite evil she said to the tiny city below "I don't really need you any more, I might as well destroy you all...." and with that started grinding and trampling the city to dust, laughing as she went. It was so crunchy underfoot which Vera loved as she casually destroyed everything she came across. She created rivers of blood as she slaughtered thousands upon thousands of what would be her subjects if she could be bothered to enslave them and enjoyed picking up gloved handfuls of city blocks to with the squished humanity. All this action was beginning to get her horny again as her gloved hand reached between her pant/trouser clad legs. "Mmmmmmm", she purred.

"I'll have to leave that for another time, can't have ants watching!", she joked, as she crashed down on her hands and knees and started crawling through the metropolis. As her gloved hands created great imprints in the ground, her legs scythed great long furrows through the landscape as she continued obliterating the once teaming city. As she got richer and richer and so easily she seemed less concerned about any protection of any investment, it was so much easier and so much more fun to just smash and destroy.

Presently she wearied of her game and just got up and went.......boot heels and soles crashing through the mess she had made of the poor city.
1451322211121212222.title: Not Done Yet

14513222111212122221.content:
Reclining at home and enjoying a massive amount of wine, Vera was quite pleased with her day's work. And then the phone rang.
"This had better be important".
The voice on the other end answered; "Our eastern enemies have mobilized their military. They are heading this way to destroy your mansion. Shall I scramble the jets?"
"No, we're going with 'Defense Plan V', alert the treasury. I'll be there soon." Vera finished off her wine and went to change her clothes.
She had expected that one day there would be a threat to her global domination and had put in place a plan to beat it back. Outside the treasury, she spoke with her defense secretary; "What am I up against?"
"Well" he said; "as far as we can tell just tanks and trucks and ground troops. There are a few aircraft we're tracking, but we're not sure what type or at what ceiling they can operate."
"How big are they?"
"The tanks are about an four inches long to you, Governess. Fairly large to most of us."
"Hmm... a shell from one of those could still do some damage to me, huh?"
"Yes ma'am. I'd recommend Condition 100."
The room fell silent. Under Defense Plan V, Condition 100 meant the treasury would electronically create 100 Trillion credits and transfer them directly to Vera. She would be more massive than anyone present wanted to imagine.
'Let's do it." Vera was almost giddy with the idea of being so much bigger than she already was.

The invading force had been able to see Vera from a long ways off, but she was out of range for the guns fitted to their tanks. To soldiers' collective horror, she began to swell high into the sky. So massive she became they lost the perspective of scale and suddenly didn't know how close they were.What they did know was that she was wearing a very tight white T-shirt, Green army type trousers, and menacing looking Leather boots. These weren't the high fashion that typically were on her feet, but rather looked more like something a goth girl might wear. Rounded and chunk with a (relative) five inch heel and a two inch platform. All of which on massive treads.
14513222111212122221.title: She does now go home

145132221112121222211.content:
A massive group of fighter jets rushed toward the gigantic woman. They began to climb. The plan was to first blind the tyrant by launching missiles into her face, then the tanks and rocket trucks would finish the job. They climbed and climbed and climbed. But for all the altitude they gained it didn't matter. All of the planes; all 250 planes, 500 tanks, 200 other vehicles and about 10,000 soldiers were squelched flat under one foot step.
And with that, the war was over.
"Well. I guess I had better go inspect the country I just conquered." Vera was quite pleased with herself.
145132221112121222211.title: The Air Force Arrives.

As she fumbled with her black leather gloved hands in her matching handbag to find the phone, she smiled wickedly, she was loving this.....playfully kicking over a dam flooding a valley and stepping on small villages as she walked she looked at the phone, "hmmmmm, this is quite a big one and they look quite wealthy, can't have this, she giggled, as she approached the town. Treading on the crunchy houses in the suburbs was easy but some of those office blocks, they were actually up to her knee or higher in some cases. Knocking some over to truly make her presence felt she placed her tightly gloved hands on her slim hips where the curve of her tight fitting suit jacket flowed and with her legs slightly apart, boot heels firmly planted on more structures she demanded to see the mayor and the council.........

1451322211121221.content:
"Come on, show yourselves", Vera demanded, tapping her boot toe shattering more structures, "I can't see you!". "We....'re here". Small figures cowered before the goddess as she absent mindedly crushed more structures and the tinies in them."Now burn down your town hall, you won't be needing that any more......". There was hesitation, "go on, do what I say, or I'll $&^%ing do it for you!". The councillors seeing the fire and fury in her eyes and knowing what she was capable of, seeing it so many times before with other cities, meekly torched the symbol of their city government.

"Now, listen up! I need to clear this land for my new goldmine. I know you will generously support this project as orders have gone out to compulsorily take 90% of your wealth, no complaining the last city was 95%, gestures of thanks will be gratefully received, So get going, you have 5 minutes!".

The unreasonableness of this request, the very short time allowed really betrayed Vera's desire, almost lust, to destroy a city and actually seeing the people flee from her, she can enslave the survivors and anyway she had plenty of other tinies to use for working in the construction and manning of the mine. In addition the relatively large size and wealth of the city was an affront to her goddesshood for want of a better word.

So inevitably it happened. Squatting down she started sweeping away city blocks with her tight leather gloved hands, glorying in the tallest structures collapsing at her touch and seeing 1000s fall to their deaths. After several minutes of destruction she stood up to her full height and arms folded sweeping the remains with booted feet she spoke: "any of you still there, report here, where my right boot has cleared a little space, haha, tomorrow morning, 5am, and you will be given your orders. Your benefactor, Vera, signing off".

With that, arms still folded, Vera walked off. Fortunately for the survivors she walked back the way she came so she didn't carelessly trample over the remains of the city as she frequently did. This also meant she didn't see the remains of the city and the surviving inhabitants shrink and shrink and shrink..........

At this point the sun was starting to set as she noticed in the distance there was a big city. This was odd to Vera cause the largest building had to be coming up to at least her knees. She starts towards the city but then notices a small barricade of in tall officers. It was at this point that she realizes that she has walked to the edge of her territory meaning she probably doubled in size again throughout the day. Knowing the current situation Vera heads back home with plans to talk to that section Governor tomorrow.

14513222111221.content: The walk was uneventful as she reached her home, well uneventful for Vera anyway, as she playfully stepped on anything in her path. She did enjoy grinding the little people into the ground, literally as well as financially, even trampling her own businesses if she felt like it, particularly if she felt they weren't doing very well. 14513222111222.content:
Vera shouted for an aide;
"Who owns that?" she pointed at the mine. She had some vague memory of a large gold deposit being discovered that would enrich the entire area.
"Well Ms. Mueller, technically the state owns it. The gold ore was found on public land."
But as of yet nothing had been produced. Only just recently was all the equipment in place to begin operations.

Vera went home and crafted a plan. She came up with some b.s. story that the land was worthless after-all, and out of the "goodness of her heart" she would buy it from the state for a fraction of what had been invested.

Never afraid to get dirty, Vera returned the next day. She was wearing a tight white t-shirt, a high viability vest and blue jeans. She didn't actually own work boots, but instead she wore something more stylish, brown leather boots with a rugged tread and about four inch heel and a one inch platform. With a massive shovel, a huge piece of real estate made its way skyward. Vera moved more earth in a single scoop than any of the equipment could touch in an entire week. In that hovel full was enough gold to make Vera even more ridiculously huge. And who knows how much more gold is there?
