145132221112221.content: Suddenly as Vera contemplated the shovelful and the amount of gold there she was gripped with spasms of ecstasy in her body. Involuntarily dropping the shovel with its real estate, which then crashed to the earth creating tremors and crushing a lot of the mine equipment, she gripped her chest, her dirty work gloves dirtying her t-shirt, and gripped other parts of her body. With her eyes shut she was overcome with complete excitement, riches beyond even her dreams, and the 600 foot beauty began to grow and grow and grow. How tall would she grow? As she stood there eyes shut she heard the ground at her booted feet groan and even shatter. Presently the noise stopped and Vera opened her eyes. She looked down, it was misty. "****! that's the clouds! She pushed the mist aside and couldn't believe her eyes, she was huge! The landscape seemed so far away..........She had to be 6000ft tall now, as her booted feet rested on the ground below. Lifting up one foot, she saw a tiny shovel and a squashed mine fall off her treads and her other was on a nearby town. In between the ground was laid bare, with so much gold. Vera smiled, she was very happy. Then it occurred to her as she calculated on her phone how the amount of gold affected her growth, that it was only what she saw which caused her to grow. How much more gold to discover, how much more gold. She had a sudden rush of joy when she realised how even more rich and powerful she become and for effect gripped a neighbouring mountaintop and squeezed it in her gloved hand, and laughed loudly as it explosively shattered. Hands on hips now she looked around and contemplated her surroundings, the most powerful being on earth. What to do now?
145132221112221.title: Vera Gets Bigger

Dennis Weinberger always had have a difficult live. He was born in a very poor family and therefor he had a bad start in this size-sociality. He had been born into a very poor family and his size with 17 years was just a mere 15 cm (5 inches).

His parents had moved out of the city since the living costs there where way too high for them. The small citys where just occupied with poor people from 10 to 30 cm height. This made living much more joyful, without the restrictions and the view of the giants. Here, on the country, they didn't have to pay the security taxes and the food here was much cheaper because everybody knew about the financial problems of their neighbors.

It was just a small settlement with a little bit more than 80 families living here. As a teenager you havn't had a lot of things to do but on the other hand, you couldn't afford to go out partying too often anyways.

He worked in the shop of his parents and went to highschool, which was in a small city about 15 Kilometers away from his little town. His dream was the one almost every little guy had in his youth: Beeing really big one day!

And the "popular" girls are all pushing the thirty centimeter mark. As a matter of fact, you have noticed a couple of them that slouch during the "measuring day" just so they won't be "runts" if they are sent to the next school up. The 30 cm girls are DOUBLE your height and extremely attractive. It just makes you want to work all the harder to be more successful in life and get some height on yourself so you will be more noticed!

choices: He reach the college district without any incident.
1511.content:
Dennis knew the only way for he to get bigger was getting a good job that paid well. Most jobs for the small people involved working on the industry, or the agriculture. Even if he had been born in middle class life woulnd't be easy: He would have to work in shops with small business, but would have to face heavy competition. Now and then there were some highly intelligent middle class people who developed new technology, but working by itself was very expensive, and people ran into debits very easily.

Even if the bank credit was still available for the tiny people, the bankers disregarded it as they profits were low and the risks were big. They were still feeling the effects of the 2074 housing bubble, when a lot of banks broke down. They even tried to ask for help from the goverment, but the biggest banks saw it as an opportunity to wipe down all the competion. The middle class also suffered a lot, many had to be downsized.

That's why he had studied a lot. There were other alternatives, such as sports, or arts, but for those, he would be entering very late in the game, and only the very talented got big.

Of course there were always the underground options: stealing, seling drugs, and prostituition. For the middle class the underworld would have more options such as fraud, usury, oligopoly formation, but the police were very alert.

So Dennis thought he would try what he though was the best option going to the university. As he entered in the metro station he could only imagine what he was going to see, after all, the University was situated in the high middle class district, which held most of the public buildings. Beyond that district was the millionaires and after that one the billionaires, however, visitors from the lower classes were prohibited up there, 'cause it was an area which many tried to steal.

Dennis finaly entered the train and took a seat next to a relatively tall girl: he couldn't even reach the floor with his foot, but the girl almost reach up to the ceiling.

- So what are you going to do in the big city ma'm?- Dennis politely asked.

- I am gonna play basketball and you? - She replied.

- I will try to enter the college. - Dennis aswered. - let me introduce myself i'm Dennis.

- Samantha.- she told him. - And before you ask, i'm 55 cm.

You tough wow she is very tall for a poor people, if she had more 5 centimeters she would have to compete in the lower middle class tournement. This way she kept relatively taller than her opponents, what would give her an advantage.

She told Dennis that in truth she would have to be in the lower middle class tournment, but she transfered good part of her money to her little sister account.

- This way I give my sister an early height advantage to keep her intersted in basketball, which will make her grow even more in the future. So she doesn't have to sell her body.

Dennis knew that was the reality of his time: the poor girls either hoped to have good looks and marry a richer husband, or they sold their body, and hoped to not get caught by the police or the pimps.
She had reached into her station, and kissed Dennis with her big lips in his cheek. She stood up and said goodbye. Dennis, in his turn, stood up and hugged her knee like a child hugged his mom. Dennis secretely hoped he saw her again.
As the door closed Dennis continued his journey.

What happens now?
1511.title: Concentrate on acedemics

choices: Dennis goes to the street, trying to find a job
15111.content:
- We will have to dismiss your aplication.

Dennis was devasted. He tried to stand up but it only made him look worse: The School Principal was a literal giantess: She,was sitting at her chair, while Dennis was at the top of the table, mesmerized by the whole situation he got into. Trying to summon courage from the deapths of his soul he tried to talk some sense into the the 50 feet giantess who towered above him.

- But look at my grades! they are the best of my school! And this is the only way I can get a good job? How am I supposed to succeed at life if I don't have any study?

-I'm sorry Mr Dennis, but this university has to pay it's bills, or we go bankrupt. We can't afford to do charital work, and offering scholarship to someone whom we don't have any perspective of raising the money would be a very risky job. Besides, you should had taken a look at our measuring rod before you've tried to beg here.

He looked at where she was taking him. She put him at the end of the rod and he looked up: the line was at lest a hundred times his size!

He was really intimidated, but this was the society he lived on. As he left, he stared at all of the hottest, and tallest girls he ever saw, entering the college.
15111.title: He reach the college district without any incid...

choices: take the job, you need the money
151111.content:
With no way of affording college Dennis had no choice but to find a job. “perhaps I can save enough for college” he thought to himself as he entered the employment agency. “Can I help you?” asked a young women in a business suit who was easily 5 times his hight. “I'm looking for some work” Dennis said nervously as she towered over him “do you have any jobs for someone my size?” “Well... we mostly deal with people who are a bit larger” the woman replied as she walked over to a filing cabinet “but rich households are always looking for servants, it will probably pay better than any of the other jobs open to someone your size.”

Dennis felt his heart sink when he heard that was the only work available. Just as poor people were shrunk, rich people grew, he'd probably be no bigger than a bug in comparison and he'd heard many stories about how dangerous working around them could be. But then these jobs did pay well, if he could keep out of the way and stick it out for while he'd be able to get some savings together and maybe go to college, if not then at least he'd get a little bigger. “Ah, here's a perfect job.” The women announced, interrupting Dennis' thoughts. “A business woman in the rich part of town needs servants for her home which she shares with her two daughters, good wages and free accommodation on site.” The woman glanced at Dennis before looking back at the job description. “Someone your size will probably be doing mostly cleaning, but you may get more opportunities if you can save your wages and get bigger. So, are you interested?​”
151111.title: work as a servant?

1511111.content:
A few days later Dennis was starting his new job, he couldn't shake the sense of unease that he got traveling through the rich areas, he'd never seen buildings so big and it all left him feeling rather insignificant. Soon he'd arrived at his destination and found a small door in the side of the cliff like wall, clearly a separate entrance for people his size. “Hello, it's Dennis, I'm supposed to be starting work here” he said into the intercom. “Just a moment, someone will be right with you” a response hissed from the speaker.

Soon the door opened by a young man who looked to be in his early 20's wearing blue overalls. “you must be Dennis, I'm Pete, I've been asked to show you around so follow me and I'll get you sorted out for work and give you the grand tour.” Dennis followed Pete through the door into a corridor. “These are the servants quarters for people our size” Pete explained as they walked “you'll feel at home here, were all the same size. But before I show you around we just need to get you sorted out with some overalls and a phone, in here.” Pete took Dennis into a supplies room. “Here are your overalls and here's a phone, keep it with you at all times, when you're needed for a job someone will call you.” Thanks” Dennis responded as he pulled on the overalls. “What kind of work can I expect?” “Mostly gonna be cleaning out in the house I'm afraid, at least to start with. Don't worry, we'll show you the ropes” Pete laughed as Dennis finished getting dressed.

“So what about the people we're working for, what are they like?” Dennis asked as they headed back into the corridor. “Well...” Pete hesitated. “I wont sugar coat it, they don't see us as people, and they're not looking out for you as they walk around, so you need to keep out of their way, you get me?” Dennis nodded without saying anything. “Melinda and Kelly aren't too bad. Melinda's the one paying our wages, she's away on business at the moment, not sure when she's back but it shouldn't be too long. you'll recognise her when you see her, long brown hair, late 40s, not bad looking for her age though. Kelly's her eldest daughter, 22, light brown hair, kinda halfway between brunet and blond, you'll probably see her wile I'm showing you around. As I say they aren't too bad, just keep out of their way and do what they tell you and you'll be fine. Amanda's the one you need to look out for, she's 18 and going through a bit of a punk phase, let's just say you want to avoid her as much as you can.” Dennis remained silent thinking about what he'd been told as he followed Pete trough the corridor, after a couple of minutes Pete broke the silence. “Don't worry, you'll get used to working around them, what do you wanna see first, the house or the servants quarters?
1511111.title: your first day

15111111.content: “See the house, I guess ” Dennis said sounding a little unsure. “Good call” Pete responded enthusiastically, “once I've shown you the house we can chill out back here, follow me.” Dennis followed Pete into a large room filled with small vehicles, almost like golf carts, as well as a few trucks. “Hop in, we use these to get around. The house is too big for people our size to travel on foot.” Soon they were on their way, they drove through a short tunnel and out into a room the likes of which Dennis had never seen, a vast empty white space with only a few columns rising high into the air, Dennis looked up to realise they were nothing more than table and chair legs. “This is what we call the big kitchen, there's another kitchen for small people were their meals are cooked, but if they just want a snack or drink they make it themselves here, it's quicker than getting tiny people to make it. The table and chair all have lifts built into one of the legs so we can get up there for cleaning, there's lifts to the countertops aswell. You want to have a look up there or move onto the lounge?"
15111111.title: see the house

151111111.content:
“I'll show you the table top.” Pete said as he turned the vehicle towards the table legs without giving Dennis a chance to answer. “You'll be able to see the whole kitchen from up there.” Dennis noticed things get darker as they drove under the tables shadow and pulled up beside the table leg. Dennis craned his neck looking up to the top of the table leg as he got out of the kart and followed Pete into the lift. “How often do we clean in here?” Dennis asked as he felt the lift begin to rise “As often as is needed.” Pete explained. “The table and counter tops get cleaned once a day usually. We try to do the floor less often, it can be dangerous if someone walks in, but we still have to clean it every couple of days usually, we only clean the chairs every week or two.”

Soon they felt the lift stop and the doors slid open, Dennis and Pete stepped out into a small hole cut into the wooden table top. “Up here.” Pete said as he began climbing a ladder which took them to the table top, Dennis followed right behind him and pulled himself up. The table was empty except for a fruit bowl in the middle filled with giant fruit many times the size of Dennis, he was shocked at the sight, being only 5 inches tall he was used to seeing apples nearly as big as him but he'd never seen one dwarf him like this. “w-why is the fruit so big?” he stammered nervously, realising just how tiny he was compared to the rest of the room. “They have stuff enlarged to their size.” Pete responded “you've never seen a rich persons house before?” Dennis took a moment to answer as he walked across the table, he could see the kitchen appliances on the countertops, he couldn't believe how big it all was. “the biggest I've seen are things for normal people” he eventually replied “how big are they here?” Pete didn't get a chance to answer as the door suddenly swung open and in walked the biggest girl Dennis had ever seen, compared to her Dennis couldn't have appeared more than half an inch tall. She was slightly pale but it made her no less attractive, her brown hair was cropped short and she wore a stripy red and black tank top which exposed her midriff along with a short leather skirt, fishnets, knee high lace up boots and a silver ring in the centre of her bottom lip. Dennis realised this must have been the youngest daughter, Amanda, who Pete had warned him about. Both men stood in silence as she walked past the table, apparently without noticing them, and began to poor herself a glass of orange juice. Suddenly Pete grabbed Dennis “Quick, we need to get down.” He said as he started running towards the lift, Dennis following close behind. As they approached the lift everything turned dark as a shadow loomed over them and Amanda’s glass of orange juice was slammed down covering the hole to the lift.

Both men stopped in their tracks and looked up to see Amanda's eyes fixed on them with a look of irritation on her face, much like you'd expect to see on someone who had found a fly in their soup. She sat down and rested one arm on the table while she reached over to the fruit bowl and picked up an apple, glaring at the two men the whole time. Dennis was too frightened to move or say anything, Pete seemed to remain calm but also stood in silence, they just stood their and watched as the giant girl took bites of her apple which she chewed slowly, the sound of her chewing filled Dennis with dread, every movement made her seem unthinkably powerful compared to him. “What are you doing here?” Amanda said, finally breaking breaking the silence “You don't appear to be working.” Her irritation was clear in her voice. “I'm sorry, Miss.” Pete responded calmly. “I've been tasked with showing our newest member of staff around the house.” “Well...” Amanda paused as she finished eating . “I suppose that's ok.” She said as she dropped her apple core on the table. The sudden thud caused Dennis to jump back, he then noticed Amanda smirking at his display of fear. “So... You're new... how would you like your first job?” Amanda asked as her smirk grew into a grin. “I've got some apple skin stuck between my teeth, you're small enough to go in my mouth, perhaps you can get it out.” Dennis was terrified by the suggestion, she couldn't really expect him to do that. “I- I d...” He stuttered trying to find the words. “I don't think tha-” SLAM, he was broken off mid sentence as Amanda slammed her hand down next to them, the shock knocking both him and Pete off their feet. “You work for us, I don't want to hear what you think, if I ask you to do something you do it, is that clear?” Amanda said angrily as she leaned in close to them. Dennis' ears were still ringing from the sound of Amanda hitting the table as her face filled his vision, to shocked to speak he simply nodded in response as he pulled himself to his feet and realised he was standing between Amanda’s thumb and index finger and it dawned on him how close he'd been to being crushed, even with her palm laid flat on the table he wasn't even tall enough to see over the top of her hand. Suddenly Amanda's thumb and index finger closed in on him and he found himself being pulled into the air and dropped into her mouth before he even knew what was happening. Dennis was overwhelmed by the smell of mouth wash and apple as he tried to gain his footing on Amanda's giant tongue, he stumbled forward terrified that she might loose her patience with him and crush him between her teeth, every twitch he felt in her tongue sent shivers of terror trough his body. Soon he got to her teeth which were almost as big as he was and started frantically pulling at a piece of apple peel until it came loose and he fell backwards onto her tongue. “I've done it, it's out” he shouted then suddenly found himself being propelled forward into the open air as Amanda spat him out. Pain shot through Dennis as he landed on the hard wooden table. “What's your name?” Amanda demanded as Dennis struggled to get up. “His name is Dennis” Pete interrupted as he ran over to help Dennis to I feet. “Dennis, huh, I'll be keeping an eye on you” Amanda responded menacingly.
151111111.title: you meet Amanda

1511111111.content:
Amanda picked up her glass of orange juice and took a sip, Pete and Dennis ran as she nearly put the glass down on top of them. “Well... What are you standing around here for?” She asked impatiently. Pete quickly apologised and the two made their way towards the lift in silence.

“How are you feeling?” Pete asked once they were in the lift.

“I don't think I've ever been so scared, I thought she was going to kill me” Dennis groaned, his body still ached from his fall onto the table.

“You're lucky she didn't kill both of us, you never question them, if you're asked to do something you do it, no matter how dangerous or unpleasant it sounds.” Dennis could sense the anger in Pete's voice as they left the lift an got into their kart and he apologised as they drove away, though he couldn't help feeling irritated that he was the one having to apologise after what he'd been through. The van suddenly screeched to a halt as Amanda’s booted foot suddenly blocked their path, they looked up to see her looking down at them.

“Watch where your driving, I wouldn't want you to get hurt.” She smirked before walking over to the sink.

“Let's get out of here before she comes back.” Pete said as he drove at full speed towards the door. “And don't worry about it, just remember tat if you're asked to do something you do it, no matter what. She must have gone easy on you because your new, but I'm sure she'll be seeing more of you in the future.”

“Is that why she asked for my name?” Dennis said glumly.

“I can only assume, normally she doesn't care what our names are.” Pete said as the kart drove through the doorway into the lounge. “Don't worry, just do what she tells you and you'll be fine, she'll forget about you soon enough.” he added trying to sound reassuring
1511111111.title: she let's you leave

choices: Amanda comes in from the kitchin
15111111112.content:
As they entered the lounge Dennis saw another girl relaxing on the sofa watching tv who he assumed was Kelly, the older sister. She was obviously related to Amanda and shared her sisters beauty, she had longer and much lighter hair which was tied back with her fringe brushed to one side and wore a black t-shirt with blue skinny fit jeans, her legs extended in front of here and her bare feet rested on a rug which seemed to cover most of the room. Dennis noticed many people his own size dotted around the room working, a few of them seemed dangerously close to Kelly's feet.

“They're cleaning the rug.” Pete explained as they drove along the wooden floor towards the sofa “Not a good job when they're walking about.” He gestured towards Kelly as spoke. “We normally try to stop working and finish the job later if they start using the room but they don't like that. They think it's just us being lazy.” As they drove they passed Kelly's shoes, a pair of low cut black flats which dwarfed their kart. Pete couldn't help but chuckle as Dennis held his nose. “Just wait until you have to clean a pair.” Dennis just looked at him without saying anything. “Cheer up, Amanda will probably have you cleaning her shoes.” Pete said, still laughing. “Her feet don't smell quite as much as Kelly's”

Dennis wasn't seeing the humour in Pete's comments. “Is it safe to drive this close?” he asked as they drove along the front of the sofa.

“We'll be fine as long as we stay close to the sofa.” Pete said confidently. “Just be glad you're not working there.” He added as he gestured towards two men scrubbing the carpet near Kelly's foot. Dennis nodded as he watched them working while Kelly flexed her toes. Just like when he was watching her sister, every small movement made her seem immensely powerful, she could end their lives without even thinking about it. He kept watching as they drove under her legs keeping as close as possible to the sofa.
15111111112.title: Kelly is in the lounge

151111111122.content:
“Hey Kel.” Amanda said as she entered the room, Her voice terrified Dennis, he looked behind nervously to see servants fleeing from her path as she walked into the centre of the room, some only narrowly avoided being crushed beneath her boots.

“Oh, hey. You wanna watch tv?” Kelly said sitting up as she addressed Amanda, she stretched her legs and then rested her feet down back down, Dennis heard a scream which was cut off as one of her feet came down on the two men who were cleaning, pinning them to the ground. “EWWWW” Kelly cried as she felt a squirming against the soul of her foot and dragged it across the rug to wipe it clean, ripping the trapped men to pieces and leaving a red smear and mangled body parts where the men had been. “They're so disgusting” she said looking at the mess between her feet.

“Don't worry.” Amanda laughed at her sisters reaction, she'd always found it funny how her sister reacted when she stepped on one of the servants. “They can clean it up.” She added, pointing towards the kart at the bottom of the sofa.

“I know.” Kelly sighed. “It's not the mess, I just hate they way they squish, it's gross.”

“I don't get why it bothers you, they're just bugs, I used to love squishing them” Amanda said almost sounding nostalgic as she looked down and hovered her foot over one of the servants working on the floor, before she placed it down next to the frightened man. In truth she still enjoyed crushing her servants, but now she only did it intentionally when she was angry and wanted to vent her frustrations. She looked from the tiny figure by her foot over to the two who were getting to work cleaning the mess between her sisters feet, savouring the feeling of power she had over them.


“I can't believe we're doing this.” Dennis complained as they stopped the cart between Kelly's feet. “We're going to get killed.”

Pete sighed as he got out of the kart “what are we supposed to do? You know she'll kill us if we don't do it, let's just get it over with, the quicker we're done the better.” Dennis knew Pete was right but he hated everything about the situation, he couldn't wait to be done. His stomach turned as he was overcome with the site of the mangled bodies and the smell of Kelly's feet.

“I can't believe they talk about us like that.” Dennis said as Pete got the cleaning equipment form the back of the kart

“you'll learn to ignore it.” Pete said blankly ass he climbed onto the rug. “SHIT” he cried as he climbed onto the rug “Come quick, this guy's still alive.” Dennis climbed on the rug and ran over to where Pete was standing, the site shocked him, lying amongst the blood and gore was the upper half of one of the men, his body had been completely destroyed from the waste down and he just lay there groaning, he appeared to be too weak to talk and it was obvious there was nothing they could do for him. “I'm going to move you somewhere safer.” Pete said as he started dragging the man away from the area they had to clean. “We're going to get help” he said knowing there was nothing that could be done. His head hung low as he walked back to where Dennis was standing. “Forget about him, he's a gonner.” Pete said quietly without looking up. “We better start scrubbing.” Dennis said nothing as he got to work, as he scrubbed he couldn't help notice Amanda looking at them, the way she talked about them and the cruel smirk on her face filled him with rage.


“It's just when you step on them and they're all warm and sticky.” Kelly continued, oblivious to the events unfolding between her feet. “I hate the way it feels, I should just keep my shoes on when they're around.”

Amanda burst into laughter at the comment. “Remember when I used to put them in your shoes? You used to freak right out.” Her laughter trailed off as she approached the sofa. “Move up, I wanna sit down.” She added.

“Urg, don't remind me.” Kelly said wincing as she moved to the right of the sofa, Dennis and Pete froze as she lifted her foot, then both breathed a sigh of relief as it passed over them and rested safely on the other side. They heard the sofa creak as Amanda sat down and Dennis winced as she rested her foot on the dying man with a sicking crunch. They continued cleaning in silence while Amanda and Kelly talked amongst themselves.

“I think we're done.” Dennis said as he looked around to see if they'd missed any spots.

“I'm wish.” Pete responded as he nodded towards Amanda's boot. “She stepped on that guy, wee gotta clean that up.”

“You're kidding, how?”

“We have to get her to move, if she finds we missed a spot someone will get the blame.” With that Pete started shouting up to the sofa, trying to make himself heard over the tv. “MISS AMANDA, MISS AMANDA”

Eventually Amanda noticed the shouting coming from the floor, though she couldn't make out what was being said. She sighed angrily as she turned down the tv and leaned forward to look down at the two servants. “What?” she spat the word out with the same look of irritation Dennis remembered from when he first saw her. “Oh, it's you two.” She added, only now recognising them from the kitchen now she looked closer.

“Awfully sorry to disturb you, miss.” Pete said trying to placate her. “But I'm afraid you stepped on... Well you stepped on some of the mess we were cleaning.” Pete chose his words carefully. “We'd be very grateful if you could move your foot so we could finish cleaning.”

Amanda sighed angrily again. “Fine” She lifter her foot lightly resting in on the back of her heal. “Get under there and clean it, don't forget to clean any gunk of the bottom my boot as well. And hurry up, I'm not going to wait too long, you've tried my patience enough today.” She added menacingly.

Pete started approaching the Amanda’s boot “You wait here. You've had a hard enough first day.”

“You heard her, it'll be quicker if I help.” Dennis followed behind

“Ok, I'll scrub the floor, you scrub her boot” Pete said as he crawled under, Dennis followed and was quickly overwhelmed by the smell of rubber and human remains caught amongst the boots tread, some of which had clearly been here for a long time. He worked quickly at his unpleasant task

Kelly giggled at Amanda “You're so hard on them”

“They're just so stupid, they can't just get a job done and get out of the way. I don't want them disturbing me while I'm trying to watch tv.” Amanda said, leaning back on the sofa.

“It's not their fault.” Kelly was still giggling. “Think how small their brains are. You can't expect them to get buy without us.”

"They should still know their place. Like this." Amanda pointed to the tv, the news had come on with a report about the ill treatment off the poor. "They have their own zones in cities, if they choose to live or work outside of those zones that's their choice. What are we supposed to do? Walk around staring at the floor? They have to keep out of our way." Kelly nodded in agreement.

Pete and Dennis quickly finished their work and crawled out from under Amanda’s boot. “let's get the fuck out of here.” Pete said as they walked to the kart, as they reached their vehicle they saw Amanda lower her foot flat on the ground without bothering to check if they were still working beneath her. “She's never bluffing.” Pete said as they left Amanda and Kelly watching tv and drove into the hall.
151111111122.title: Amanda comes in from the kitchin

choices: Pete insists on showing Dennis everything
1511111111222.content:
“We'll head up stairs, they'll be having dinner soon, I'm guessing you don't want to spent any more time around them.” Pete said as they drove through the hall. ”It's not always this bad. Working here, I mean.”

Dennis didn't answer, he wasn't sure which one of them Pete was trying to convince. He looked up at the coats that hung above them in the hall, they all looked so expensive and fashionable with the exception of a tatty leather jacket on the end, he knew most of them cost more than he would earn in a lifetime. Beneath the coats was a row of shoes lined up against the wall. “The lift upstairs is at the end of the shoes” Pete said pointing ahead.

Dennis wasn't listening, he was in awe of the glamorous high healed sandals, pumps, and flats which loomed over their tiny cart. Amongst them pairs of running shoes, one for every member of the household, his mind boggled at the thought of them running, the shockwaves alone would be enough to destroy cities his size. The flat sandals and flip flops were no less intimidating, they might not have towered over Dennis but he could see the dark footprints where the surface had worn away, it all served to remind him just how small he was compared to these monsters. At the end of the row he notice the shoes which were obviously Amanda's, a pair of what looked like combat boots and a well worn pair of red converse allstars which looked as though they were about to fall apart. He could see the converse been drawn all over, much the same way the punk girls in his school used to customise theirs. Despite their size the familiarity seemed almost comforting, Dennis couldn't help to smile a little, though his smile was soon wiped from his face as he noticed the words “death from above” amongst the drawings. “I've had enough.” Dennis said bluntly as Pete drove into the lift taking them upstairs.

“Sorry, but I've gotta show you the upstairs.” Pete tried to sound sympathetic. “If you get called to a job and don't know where to go then you'll end up in some real trouble.”

“Can you you just point out where everything is and get it over quick?” Dennis sighed. "I don't think I can take much more of this."
1511111111222.title: head upstairs

choices: His phone, he has to get to work
Nothing, he's got some free time
15111111112221.content:
Pete sighed as he looked over to Dennis, seeing he was visibly distressed. “Ok, I'll make it quick.” Pete promised as the lift began to rise.

“Thanks.” Dennis muttered.

Pete was true to his word the rest of the tour consisted of little more than a lap around the upstairs hall with Pete explaining which door lead to which room and they were soon back in the downstairs hall. Dennis shuddered at the thought of encountering the titanesses again, he could hear them talking as a they drove through the hall. “”They're in the dining room. “Pete said as he pointed to wards the open door. “We don't need to go in there.” Dennis looked inside as they drove past, Amanda and Kelly were sitting at opposite ends of a table joking with each other as they ate. Dennis couldn't see the top of the table from his low vantage point but he noticed some well dressed men standing at the tables edge, they appeared to be much larger than Dennis but were still tiny compared to the girls. “They're the waiters.” Pete explained. “They carry the plates out straight onto the table. It can take about 20 of them to lift it when it's full.”

“They just stand there while they eat?” Dennis enquired as he watched the figures.

“Yeah, they have to stand perfectly still the whole time.” Pete answered as they pulled away into the lounge, Dennis watched the men who'd been cleaning earlier packing away their equipment as they drove through the room, then through the big kitchen, as they they called it, and into the safety of the servants quarters. He declined Petes offer to show him around and introduce him to some people, he just wanted to be shown to his room and go to sleep. Though he didn't sleep well thinking about the situation he'd gotten himself into, he'd signed a 3 month contract which had to be completed before he could quit, to break it would make him a fugitive but he wasn't sure he could survive 3 months in this house. After a difficult nights sleep he was awoken to the sound of...
15111111112221.title: Pete agrees

151111111122211.content:
Dennis woke to the sound of his phone ringing, his room was dark and windowless making it impossible to guess what time it was. He reached around for his phone trying to follow the sound, then his finders searched the keypad looking for the button to answer it. “Hello” he crocked as he finally answered it.

“This is human resources.” An official sounding woman announced. “Am I speaking to a Dennis Weinberger?

“Yeah” Dennis confirmed, now searching around for his bedside lamp.

“You are required to report immediately to the loading area, a team is being assembled and will be dispatched for work as soon as possible.” The voice instructed.

Dennis squinted as he turned on the light, his clock read 8 though it seemed earlier in the dark. “What kind of work?”

“I'm afraid I don't have that information. All I know is a team I to be dispatched to...”
151111111122211.title: secoond day

1511111111222112.content:
Dennis hurried to the loading bay, he saw Pete standing amongst a small group of men.

“Hey.” Pete shouted upon noticing him and waved him over. “Shouldn't be too bad today.”

“Do you know what we're doing?” replied Dennis, unconvinced.

“Just a cleaning job. We'll be off soon, help load the trucks.”

Dennis helped load the cleaning supplies into the two trucks they were using, and made small talk with the rest of the team, Soon everyone had arrived, ten of them in total, they headed off. 2 men in each van and 3 carts like the one Dennis had road in yesterday. They drove through the empty rooms of the house until they reached Kelly's door which had been left ajar, though the room had been left empty with the bed unmade. The carts and vans parked against the wall, out of the way of anyone who might come into the room. The men all exited their vehicles and gathered together. “So what have we got to do?” Dennis asked

“Nothing, just wait for Kelly to get back” One of the men replied.

“She's probably out for a run.” Pete added.

Dennis looked around as the men resumed their talk from earlier, he wandered from the group slightly and heard someone shout a warning not to stray too far, Kelly's room didn't seem all that out of the ordinary for a girl in her early 20's, if it hadn’t been for the scale of the room there would have been little to betray her families wealth. Aside from possibly the expensive looking flat screen tv and sound system. The room was impeccably tidy other than the unmade bed and there was little else to look at, a desk and makeup cabinet on the wall across from the bed and several wardrobes built into the walls.

It wasn't long before they heard footsteps outside the room and the door was pushed fully open, everyone turned to see Kelly enter. The sound of her heavy breathing filled the room, she was dressed in a pair of skin-tight knee length shorts, running shoes and a tank top, her hair was tied back and she was drenched in sweat, which Dennis could see dripping from her as she walked, it wasn't long before he could smell it as well. The men all stopped their conversation as she walked in. As she pushed the door shut, trapping the men inside the room, she glanced over to where the men had assembled, she'd clearly seen them but did nothing to acknowledge their presence.

The men watched in silence as Kelly performed a few short stretches, Dennis stood in awe as he watched her titanic muscles flex, she was by no means muscle bound but certainly well toned, and at his size Dennis could see every twitch. After her stretches she took a few steps towards the men and stood what seemed even to them to be only a short distance away. Still completely ignoring the assembled servants she bent down and unlaced her running shoes before stretching back up to her full hight. 15213.content:
"Hey up there" Dennis and Amy heard, they turned to see their exiting his shop.
"Hey... dad." Amy whispered and waved down at him "I, can I pick you both up please?" she asked.
"Yeah go for it" Dennis replied "dad?" he looked at his father who nodded. Amy held out her hand and both men climbed on.
Amy brought them to her face and said "I'm so sorry" she began tearing up "for what?" Dennis asked confused "for all of this, for you having to live in this place instead of with me. Its not fair. We belong together as a family, I... I" Amy began sobbing,

Large tears splashed to the ground at her feet as she cried. "Amy." her dad said calmly "Amy listen to me. None of this is your fault. Understand? None at all."
"I should have come sooner but I didn't know where you were. I kept asking mom but she refused to tell me until recently. Why, why couldn't we be together, why'd mom have to be such a selfish bitch?" Amy continued crying.
"Amy you shouldn't talk that way about your mother. Even if she has caused us all a lot of pain" her dad tried to calm her.
Dennis barely remembered their mother. What memory's he did have were of an emotionally distant woman, he felt like she barely showed an interest in him. That still hurt him "why wasn't I good enough for her. Why didn't she want me?" Dennis had asked himself that question many times, usually while sobbing into a pillow. He'd seen her picture in magazines before. Sometimes on TV. She didn't really look that different from his memory's, she still had that same emotionally distant look in her eyes. And she was big, really big from what he knew. "Why is Amy so small? She should be way bigger because of mom right?" Dennis wondered.

"I mean how could she abandon you, especially Dennis, who does that to their own child? Leaving them to be shrunken down while they live larger than life." Amy whimpered.
"Amy come on, this should be a happy moment and you're all gloom and doom" Dennis spoke up "It's not like you could have done anything, you were just a kid."
"I'm sor..." "No, no more of this 'I'm sorry shit' It was not your fault okay. I'm your wise big brother so should listen to me" this earned a laugh from Amy and she began to relax.

"I guess it's good we're together now. I don't want us to ever be apart again, that's part of why I came here, I want you two to come with me." Amy said, leaving her dad and brother shocked.
"You want us to come with you?" her dad stammered "to live with you?"
"Yes, please come with me. I know I'm asking a lot considering you don't really know me and I've just come back into your life but.... I need you both." Amy begged.
"I don't know Amy. That's asking a lot of us so soon" her dad said.
"I know and I'm not asking you to make a right decision now but please consider it. I promise it'll be much better than this life you have now." Amy pressed on.
"Better than this huh?" Dennis pondered aloud "would mom even be okay with that though?"
"Who cares what mom wants. She's taken enough from us already and she's barely around anyway. I doubt she'd even notice you, she doesn't even notice me most of the time now." Amy's tone was sad and she hung her head.

"I get the feeling she's really depressed." Dennis thought "sounds like mom doesn't give her the affection she wants. I sure as hell understand what that feels like."
"Amy? How big is mom in comparison to you. I know she's stupid rich so I thought you'd..." "Be taller?" "Well yeah, you seem way smaller than I would have thought you'd be."
"Mom is really controlling when it comes to finances, she gives me what she feels like giving. I used to be three times as big as I am now. The she shrank me without any explanation." Amy confessed "I don't understand her at all, she's so cold most of the time."
"I know what that's like. All the memory's I have of her are her being distant with me. There were only a few times I got an actual hug from her I think." Dennis said bitterly.
"I don't remember her ever properly hugging me" Amy teared up again "why is she like this?"

"Your mother had a rough life. Before all the riches I mean." their dad said "she was born poor, poorer than we are now. Any chance she had to better her life she took it. Even if it meant abandoning the people who loved her."
"Was her life really that bad?" Amy asked, her eyes were bloodshot and her makeup was running.
"She certainly thought so. She just couldn't be satisfied with what she had, she needed to be bigger, bigger than anyone. She wanted to be the biggest person in the world she told me, all so she would never feel small and helpless again, even if it meant she'd be alone at the top of the world." their dad finished speaking and Amy and Dennis could only stand in silence.

"That doesn't excuse the things she's done to you, to me" Amy furrowed her brow.
Her dad held up his hands "I'm not making excuses for her. I'm just tryin to help you understand her thought process. You're right though, it doesn't excuse what she's done to the two of you."

A crowd had begun to gather after they'd heard Amy's crying.
"Maybe we should go for a walk Amy. Away from nosey gawking idiots." Dennis suggested.
"Okay. Hold on, it might be a bit bumpy." Amy began walking towards the outskirts of town taking care to protect her dad and brother.
"Do you want to see her?" Amy directed at Dennis "mom?" "yeah."
"I don't really know. I'm not sure it would end well if we met. Not after she abandoned me." Dennis felt tears forming in his eyes but hid them from his sister.

Once they'd reached a suitable location, a quite open clearing, Amy sat down and Dennis and their dad climbed off her hand.
Before they could continue talking Amy's phone began beeping. "I got a text from a friend" she said and began reading.
Amy's eyes went wide and her mouth fell open.
"Amy whats wrong?" her dad asked.
"It's mom" she "she.." "what? is she hurt?" "no she did it, she actually did it. Its insane"
"Whats insane?" Dennis was confused "she owns the bank" "what bank" "all of them" she whispered. They sat there in stunned silence.
"How can one person own all the banks. Aren't their rules against that kind of thing?" Dennis asked
"Not really, not anymore, not after mom worked her magic on all the government's." Amy made an audible gulp.
"Whats going to happen now? What will she do with all that money?" Dennis asked "you know her better than anyone"

"I'm not sure but mom basically owns the whole world now. She controls everyone's money. I..." Amy's phone went off again, a phone call this time "hello" she answered. "Amy, Amy oh god you have to do something" a frantic voice responded. "Mel calm down what's going on" "we're shrinking Amy, everyone is shrinking." "she wouldn't" Amy whispered "Mel I promise I'll call you back okay?." Amy hung up. "I don't know what to do" she said still shocked. "I.."

Dennis and his dad were hit first. Amy watched in horror as they began to shrink "Dad, Dennis noooo" she screamed. Dennis looked up at his sister who seemed to be growing larger and then he noticed the size difference started going in reverse. "Amy, shit, we;re shrinking" "I know I know. I'll try and..." "I mean we're all shrinking" "what?" she yelled and then noticed the size gap between them was rapidly decreasing. "What's she doing out there" Amy screamed and began typing on her phone, she sent a single line of text
"Mom please don't do this"

She eventually got a response
"Not now I'm busy"

"She's shrinking us, I cant believe she's shrinking us" Amy shook her head from side to side.
The size difference had decreased enough for Dennis to wrap his arms around his sister and hug her. The first hug she'd ever had from her brother. She would have been ecstatic if it hadn't been for their current predicament. They were still shrinking.

"Come on lets go" their dad said and began leading them back into town.
They finally arrived back at their dads shop and turned on the news. It was the same everywhere, everyone and everything on the planet had been reduced to the same measly height. All except for Dennis and Amy's mother. Miranda.

Amy began texting her mother again
"Mom what have you done? Why is it so important you've grown so big?"

"I haven't grown yet" came the reply.

Amy stood there frozen in terror. "Whats wrong" Dennis asked putting his hand on her shoulder. "How big do ya think mom is now?" he asked cautiously. Amy shook her head and started crying "she.. she.. oh god no."

They continued watching the news, waiting for anything new to arise.
Then they felt a it, a tremor and then a laugh, a deep, powerful laugh that shook them to their cores "no mom,no" Amy whimpered. Another tremor shook the shop and they dashed outside. Amy's phone beeped as she received a text
"Amy its your fucking mom, she's growing and I don't think she's stopping. She's fucking huge"

They heard screams, they saw people pointing at something in the distance and looked.

"Oh god no" Amy screamed.
"Holy shit" Dennis gasped.

It was their mother, Miranda, she was growing, her blissful smiling face was climbing higher and higher over the horizon.
They watched their mother raise her hands to sky, practically willing herself larger and larger.
"Please stop mom, please stop" Amy repeated over and over.

Their mother wore a black business suit ,that barely contained her curves, and open toed high heels. She was a little pudgy at this point in her life but still plenty fit. She really looked great for a fifty year old woman, a gigantic goddess of a woman.
15213.title: Dad comes out.

152131.content:
Miranda looked down upon the rapidly shrinking world, her world. This was where she belonged, up here and everyone else was where they belonged, at her feet. She licked her lips and thought to herself "Mine."

Amy and Dennis held each other tightly as they watched their moms continued ascent. Amy still couldn't believe she'd done this to them. "She already did this to dad and Dennis once. Now she's done it to me" thoughts and emotions raged around inside her "why aren't we enough for her. Did I ever mean anything to her at all?" Tears poured down her face.

"How small you think we are?" Dennis turned and asked his dad quietly after he'd gotten Amy to sit down on a nearby chair.
"I have no idea, I don't think I want to know." his dad replied wearily.
"Why would mom do this, even Amy hasn't been spared and she was with mom her whole life." Dennis slammed his fist on the shop wall "doesn't mom give a fuck about anyone? Is she really that fucking greedy?"

"I think it's a case of your mom being afraid about caring, although maybe that's changed since I last saw her, she probably does love you both on some level. There's no way she'd actually harm you, no matter big she is or how small you may be." his dad patted him on the back.
"Sure, assuming she doesn't step on us without realizing it." Dennis thought. He looked up "mom is still growing, she looks so happy. She never looked so happy when we were together. Love us? I doubt it."

Miranda's growth finally came to a halt. She didn't know precisely how big she was "doesn't matter really, I'm the biggest person ever. I'm really the biggest person ever." she thought, still processing what she'd become. She surveyed her new domain, she knew they were all down there, looking up at her "I own you all" she mused "all of you are mine now. Forever."
Miranda took a step forward, her foot crushing large tracts of land, and people, under it. "Mine."

They watched a leg swing forward, then they felt the shock wave as her foot came down upon the earth. She was walking towards them. She drew close and closer, she hadn't taken more than a few steps and she was almost upon them. Amy took her phone and began frantically typing

"mom stop. I'm down here, be careful where you step. please mom" Amy wasn't sure her mom still had her phone.

Her phone beeped.

"Oh really? I'm afraid I can't see you down there. You'll have to take responsibility for your own safety Amy. xxx mom"

Amy stared at the ground "selfish, uncaring bitch. she doesn't care if she steps on me does she." She saw her mothers feet getting closer "she's gonna step on me and she doesn't even care... why mom?"

As if hearing her pleas, her mom stopped. Two more steps and she probably wold have crushed them. Her tiny family looked up in awe. They couldn't see her face, hell they couldn't see past her, slightly chubby, stomach. "She's so big" Dennis murmured. He hadn't seen his mom in a long time and this is what might bring them together again. He heard Amy sobbing again, she was staring at the ground. "She's probably to scared to look up."

Then they heard her voice. It was so powerful and deep and yet distinctively feminine as well.

"Hello everyone. I'm your new God."

"She's what?" Amy screamed. She couldn't believe what she'd just heard. Their new God. Amy typed on her phone again and sent another text

"Mom what the hell? this isn't funny you know and I still can't believe you did this to me. I'm tiny."

She hit send and waited. The weird thing was she didn't hear a loud beep from above like she would have expected. "How's she getting my texts?"

"Not now I'm working. And the tiny thing? You'll have to get used to that. From now on I'm the only one allowed to be big okay? xxx mom"

Miranda felt the buzzing in her ear again as Amy sent yet another text. She'd have to deal with her little girl later.
"She's just going to have to learn to be a tiny. I'm the only one who deserves being big. Everyone else deserves to be at my feet." she thought. Miranda scanned the ground "She's down there somewhere, all tiny and helpless. My tiny little girl. And if what she said is true... my little boy."
Miranda felt a pang of guilt. She loved them deep down but she couldn't back down, not now. "I'll make sure they're well looked after" she decided. She was in control of everything now, she'd make sure they could have everything they wanted. Hopefully they'd forgive her eventually and she really wanted to see Dennis again now. Miranda tried to imagine what he looked like "I don't know if I'll ever be able to see him again. I'll be able to talk to him but... He's so tiny now"
Tears threatened to well up in her eyes but she forced them back, it wouldn't do well for the world to see its God crying.
Miranda put on a brave face and addressed the planet.

"I know you're all shocked and confused" came the booming voice of their mother "but this is the new world now, my world. You shall all obey my will for I control you all. To demonstrate..."

They felt it. They were shrinking again. "No no no" Amy screamed as her mom seemed to grow. Her mom laughed causing Amy to almost piss herself right there. The shrinking stopped fairly quickly and then reversed until they were back where they started.

"Mom please don't do that again" Amy texted. She heard a deep sigh from above and received a response

"I'm just making a point that's all. Don't worry, no harm will come to you and your brother as long as I rule. Now stop pestering me and I promise we'll talk later. xxx mom"

Amy sank back in her chair. She could tell her mom was annoyed at her "but at least she still wants to talk to me. Maybe dad was right and she really does love us in some fucked up way. Why else would she say she'll protect me."

"Are you talking with mom?" Dennis asked his sister, walking over to her.
"Yeah I've just been texting her" Amy replied and showed him her phone.
"She's the only one who gets to be big now?" he said and scrolled through each text "and she wants to talk to you latter.."
"Us later" Amy corrected him.
"Hows she texting you back? Doesn't sound like she's got a phone up there."
"I dunno, think I remember hearing her talk about some sort of implant thing. You know for computers and stuff, maybe that's how"
"She's really in control of us now. She said she's a god for fucks sake." Dennis put his head in his hands and sighed.

They listened to their mother speak for the next half an hour, not like they had a choice, as she made a list of rules and demands. She was so confident and powerful in her words they couldn't help but listen intently.
Eventually she began walking away. They weren't sure where she was going but at least they could breath a sigh of relief. She wasn't going to squash them. Not today anyway.

They sat in their dads shop, unsure of what to do with themselves. "Beep" Amy's phone went off. Amy opened the text and read aloud

"Its time to come home. I'm sending a chopper to pick you up. Bring you brother. xxx mom"

"Whats it say" Dennis asked her.
"Mom wants me home... and you to come with me." Amy looked into his eyes, pleading look on her face.
"I don't know if I can" Dennis turned away "I don't know if I'm ready"
"Please come with me. I'm scared to go alone"
"Let me think on it"

Dennis left the room and Amy texted her mom

"I don't know if Dennis will come. He's mad at you for leaving him"

"I'm not surprised he's angry with me. Tell him I just want to speak with him and if he doesn't want anything to do with me after, that's up to him. Please try and convince him Amy. xxx mom."

Amy put her phone down and followed Dennis. She found him sitting in a small kitchen, head in his hands.
"Dennis please come with me. I need you." Amy pleaded with him "mom said she just wants to talk and that if you don't want to see her again after that she'll understand."
Dennis looked up, his eyes were red from crying. Amy flung her arms around him and held on tightly, she felt Dennis return the hug and they cried together.

They sat in silence as they waited for the chopper Miranda was sending them. Amy texted her friends, trying to reassure them that everything would be okay. She'd make sure they got home safely as well.
Dennis got up and said he needed to tell their dad about their moms request, leaving Amy alone. "Mom what are you thinking" she said to herself.

Some time later Amy received a another text, telling her to go outside town where the chopper would land. Her dad and Dennis walked with her, although Dennis refused to say if he was coming home with her.

They reached the outskirts and waited. Their dad reassured Amy that he would be fine and that she could come and see him whenever she wanted. They heard the chopper approaching and Amy looked to Dennis, that same pleading look in her eyes. She desperately wanted him to come with her, she didn't want to see their mom alone, not when she was so gigantic compared with them.

The chopper landed and the door opened, revealing Miranda's PA, who waved for them to get in.

Amy turned to Dennis and asked if he was coming "Please Dennis"

Dennis looked at the chopper then at his sister "Amy..."
152131.title: Miranda's world

1521311.content:
"I guess I can't just abandon you can I. Wouldn't be much of a brother if I did." Dennis told Amy. He didn't really want to but he didn't want to leave her alone in this new world, his moms new world.
Amy smiled and hugged him "thank you thank you. I don't know if I'd have the courage to go by myself honestly."
"Alright then" Dennis turned to his father "I'll see you later okay"
"You take care of each other now" his dad hugged him and then Amy "just be careful, you can both come back any time you want."

Amy and Dennis walked towards the chopper "Hey Amy how are you?" their moms PA asked "and you must be Dennis, nice to finally meet you. Dennis waved but said nothing.
"Hey Karen" Amy just about managed a smile "mom sent you all the way out here just for me huh?"
Karen gulped "yes, she was quite insistent I retrieve you immediately. Shall we go then?"
Amy and Dennis climbed in to the chopper "this is pretty nice" Dennis said, taking a seat "I've never flown before though" he looked a little nervous.
"You'll be fine bro, it's no big deal. You seemed fine when I carried you" Amy assured him.
"We were not that high up. Not like this is gonna be" he looked out the window and grimaced as the chopper started to take off.
Amy took his hand and gave it a squeeze.

"So you've lived in that town your whole life?" Karen asked Dennis.
"Yeah pretty much since she abandoned me to run off with some rich guy" Dennis said, a small amount of venom in his voice.
Karen winced "So I guess this will be a family reunion of sorts then"
"We'll see. Not sure I'm ready for that yet, assuming I'll ever be ready" Dennis glanced at Amy "Happy I met Amy though."
Amy gave him a warm smile "Me to. I guess we'll all be taking things slowly for now"
"I have no issue with you Amy. You already know that, I'm really happy we're together okay?" Dennis smiled at his sister.

"I'm sure everything will work out just fine between you. You're mother is a great woman you know. I mean god now I guess" Karen tried to convince Dennis.
"Uh huh" he snorted "shame she wasn't a great mother though. That would actually mean something to me"
Karen fell silent. She had clearly angered Dennis and felt it best to not talk about Miranda with him.

"So, you stayed on as moms PA then" Amy asked "even after all this"
"Of course. Why wouldn't I?" Karen said quickly, clearly she was nervous about the events that had transpired.
"Did you know? What she was planning I mean"
"No I didn't. Would it make a difference to you if I said yes?"
"No I guess not" Amy slouched back and looked out the window "how long will it take exactly? To get home."
"Not long, this thing is the fastest helicopter we have. Nothing but the best for you two." Karen saw Dennis roll his eyes "I think you'll be very impressed by your home now. It's amazing whats been done with the place."
Amy eyed her suspiciously "My stuff okay?, considering..." "Yes, yes its all fine. Its been moved to your new residence" "New residence? I could have moved stuff myself. Don't exactly like people touching my belongings."
"Your things were treated with the utmost respect. She commanded it after all" Karen said.

Dennis raised an eyebrow in Karen's direction and shook his head.
Amy scooted over to her brother "You didn't really want to come did you?" Dennis shook his head "I only came because you asked me to. I don't really care what she want's, she never seemed to care about me so..."
Dennis noticed Karen fidgeting a little. She was clearly scared of his mom and was probably not used to someone talking about her like this. "Tough shit" he thought.
"You shouldn't have if you didn't want this. I shouldn't have pushed you" Amy squeezed his hand. "I know I didn't have to but unlike her I don't abandon my family when they need me."
Karen laughed nervously "Won't be long now"

The chopper flew fast towards their destination. Amy got more and more nervous as they neared her mother. She wasn't sure she wanted to be anywhere near her mom right now. Not when she'd grown so big. Amy remembered when she'd been reduced in height a while ago, her mom was big to her then, now... "She thinks she's a fucking god. The thing that scares me the most is that it might as well be true."

They heard a voice over the intercom "we're now approaching God's palace, we'll be landing in a moment"
This earned a disdainful groan from Dennis and a sigh from Amy.
"Palace. I guess it'll be one hell of an upgrade right?" Amy directed at Dennis. "You still want me to move in I take it" he cocked his head. "Well yeah, especially after, you know..." "Her shrinking everything?" "You and dad can live with me, there's gotta be plenty of room in there, right?" Amy turned to Karen who nodded.
"I don't think just anyone can move in though. God is rather strict with who gets to enter" Karen piped up.
"Well if they can't move in with me, I'll go live with them" Amy said defiantly.
Karen looked shocked "I'm sure it won't come to that." "She'd better hope not if she wants me around" Amy glowered and then looked out the window. She saw it, the palace "holy shit, look at that bro" Dennis moved beside her and looked.
"I guess its impressive enough" he said dismissively "wonder how gaudy the inside is. Vaguely remember the house being like that before she left"
Karen gasped and Amy snort laughed "I think maybe moms tastes have improved a bit since then. I think she's had time to mature you know."
"If I see tacky upholstery I can't promise I won't set fire to it." this earned another small gasp from Karen. Dennis smirked a little.
"Sounds like you've burnt stuff before" Amy leaned in.
"I found some stuff in the attic. It was crappy looking and I assumed no one would miss it. So I made a bonfire in a field with some friends. Didn't find out till later it was hers. Good times." Dennis grinned at Amy, he was enjoying making Karen squirm. Amy giggled as she noticed Karen more fidgety than ever.

Amy noticed that Dennis was refusing to call their mom, well, mom. She hoped this wouldn't be a disaster.

The helicopter landed and they all jumped out. Karen led them inside the huge palace of God as she called it. They walked along a corridor and came to an elevator "This will take us most of the way, then we'll catch the elevator in Gods office" Karen explained.
"We're going straight up?" Amy gestured to herself. She was still in her bikini.
"Don't worry, some clothes will be waiting for you at the other end. And this doesn't just go up it goes in any direction." Karen beamed proudly.
"Fancy" Dennis added "It's been tested right?" "Of course" "Oh okay then. Can it go to the nearest KFC?"
"I... no I don't think so" Karen stammered. Amy elbowed Dennis in the ribs. She knew he was enjoying being an annoyance.

They entered the elevator and began their journey deeper inside the palace. The elevator's sides were transparent, giving them a great view of other areas as they passed. Dennis whistled, genuinely impressed this time "I guess her moms tastes have improved" he thought.

It didn't take any time at all for them to reach their first destination, some sort of hub where you could catch different elevators. Just as Karen had said there were clothes waiting for Amy. "These are brand new" Amy looked at Karen.
"God hand picked them for you" she said "and she also had these delivered for..."
"Not interested" Dennis interrupted her.
"Okay then, we'll continue shall we" Karen led them to another elevator at the far end of the hub. This one was grander looking than the rest and the entire thing was transparent. Dennis looked apprehensively.
"I'm sure this one has been tested to" Amy, now fully dressed said to her brother "come on"
Amy was trying to act cool but inside she was nervous "just relax and stay calm" she thought.

They entered the elevator and Karen pressed the only button inside. They began moving, it was slower than the other one. They exited the hub and entered a wide open space.
Amy yelped as she saw in the distance, her moms foot. It was massive, it towered above them as they trundled towards it. Amy couldn't see above the bottom of her moms heels and as they moved closer they were bathed in its shadow. She started becoming more anxious as they approached. "We must be like microbes to her" Amy panicked inside.

Slowly the elevator began to change direction and began moving upwards "How long does this thing take?" Dennis asked Karen. "About five hours" she replied, seeming completely unfazed.
"Five fucking hours?" Amy fumed "All this and she couldn't have made an express elevator for her family?"
"I know it might seem very long but, lets face it God towers above us all" Karen tried to calm her.
Amy gritted her teeth "Me and her are gonna have a long talk after this. I ain't riding this stupid piece of shit every time she wants to see me." Deep down Amy was terrified, she wouldn't let anyone see it though.

Slowly the elevator climbed upwards towards their destination, towards their mother and maybe even their God.
1521311.title: "Of course I'll come with you"

15213111.content:
Dennis sat and just stared at his mothers foot, it had been ten minutes and they hadn't even reached her toes yet "way to make me feel welcome mom. Make me sit in this stupid thing for five hours instead of finding a faster way to see me." He huffed and began drumming his fingers against the window.

Amy scowled, she was equally parts scared and really pissed off. She wondered which would be stronger by the time they reached the top "hang on what if I need to pee?" she asked Karen.
"Um, well You'll have to wait till we reach the top." she said hoping the pissed off teenager wouldn't explode "Maybe I should have explained before we got in. I'm sorry."
"Great. What dumb ass designed this thing. If he's up there I'm gonna throw him off the top" Amy fumed and smacked the chair she was on.
"Please just be patient Amy" Karen pleaded.

"Is she really that serious about seeing me again? Cause if she is then this a piss poor way to start things off" Dennis didn't look at Karen as he spoke "Doesn't make a great first impression, makes me feel like she can't be that bothered."
"Of course she's serious" Karen said "but like I said before she's very tall now. Its bound to take some time."
"And yet that other one was much faster. Clearly you could of built it like that one. So why not?" Dennis guessed the answer.
It was meant to be slow, to build up anxiety as its occupants climbed. To make them realize how utterly insignificant they were compared to his mom as they climbed past her massive body. That's why the whole thing was transparent as well. To ensure those within could not escape their god.

"I... I'm sure there's a good reason for it" Karen didn't sound very sure. "I'm sure in the future a better method could be arranged for you"
"Assuming I bother coming here again. If she puts in such a poor effort why should I even try?" Dennis was getting more frustrated "Don't suppose this thing can stop and go back can it? Maybe I'll come back when she actually makes the effort to make me feel like she cares."
"Yes we could stop and go back down. But maybe I could contact the technicians for a solution. I'm sure they could find some way to speed things up. Please let me try that first at least" Karen begged. She at least wanted to make this work, mostly for Amy's sake.

"Fine" Dennis said and went back to looking out the window. Amy was currently texting on her phone.

Karen breathed a sigh of relief and went to the far end of the elevator. It could hold quite the crowd if necessary and Karen was grateful she'd be able to talk to someone in tech support away from the ears of her traveling buddy's. She took out her phone and began calling them "Come on, come on" she said.
Finally someone answered and Karen began whispering furiously "you have to make this thing go faster. If you don't I'll have to turn it around and this whole day will have backfired horribly."
"Eh, what could possibly that important? You know how long it ta..." the technician started before being cut off.
"I don't care how long it usually takes. Her children are on board and one them is about ready to smash this thing apart if it doesn't go faster" Karen growled
"Wait did you say children? I only thought there was one"
"Her son is here and hasn't seen her a long time, and if we don't go any faster he will probably refuse contact with her ever again. So far this has been a fucking shit show."
"Oh, well I'll see... hang on a moment I have another call" he put her on hold.
"Don't you fucking dare hang up on me" Karen was on the verge of screaming.
All of a sudden the elevator sped up and the technician came back on call "The car has been accelerated to its maximum eta is now one and half hours. Um, I hope things go well for everyone up their"
"Thank you. I owe you one" Karen beamed and hung up.

Amy smiled as the car began moving much faster "ta da" she said as Karen came back and sat beside her.
"What did you do?" Karen asked the grinning teenager. "I got things going faster" Amy said "I can't believe I forgot I could text mom"
"Oh, that's why they complied with my request all of a sudden" Karen said "I probably should of thought of what you did sooner really. Well done."
"A good threat goes a long way you know" Amy whispered and showed Karen what she'd texted her mom.

"Mom this stupid car is to slow. five hours is ridiculous and Dennis is probably gonna turn this thing around if you don't do something. He thinks you aren't serious about seeing him again and if he leaves he won't come back and it will be all your fault."

"I'm so sorry honey. I thought I told them to switch to a faster speed today. Please convince your brother I'm completely serious about our reunion and that I'll do whatever it takes to prove it. xxx mom"

"You'd better hurry up considering he only came because I asked him to and so far he really hasn't been impressed with how its gone."

"I've contacted the tech department and told them to push things as hard as they safely can. Tell Dennis I'm sorry and that if he waits a bit longer it'll be worth it I promise. xxx mom"

"Crisis averted I hope" Karen sighed and looked at Dennis "Maybe you should tell him then."
"Yeah" Amy got up and sat next to her brother, putting her head on his shoulder "Mom made sure they sped things up for us. She says she's sorry and she thought she'd told them earlier"
"You sure she's not just saying that so I won't leave?" Dennis looked skeptical.

"I don't think she'd lie. She actually seemed desperate for you to stay. I think she really does want to fix things between you" Amy looked out the window as they cleared their moms toes "kinda glad this thing is pressurized"
"Why?" Dennis asked. "Because I'd hate to know how bad moms feet stink right now" Amy shrugged.
"Amy shouldn't make fun of your mother like that" Karen gasped as Amy and Dennis sniggered.
"They that bad?" Dennis grinned. "You have no idea" Amy had a mock look of disgust on her face "I'll be surprised if people don't die from being near them"

Karen shook her head as Amy mocked her mom. "Hopefully God won't hear her say such things" she thought.
"How long now then?" Amy asked her. "An hour and a half" she replied "I know its still not ideal but if they push any faster it could be dangerous. I doubt your mother would appreciate it if they ended up killing you. Besides you two haven't known each other that long so maybe now is the time to get to know each other even better."

Amy and Dennis realized she was right. They still didn't know much about the other considering they'd only met this morning.
"It'll give us something to do right" Amy acknowledged "and it'll give me an advantage over mom"
"An advantage?" Dennis queried. "Yeah she always wants to know everything. It'll bug her I know you better than she does." Amy grinned.

They spent most of the journey discussing each others lives as they hurtled upwards. Occasionally they'd look out the window to see what landmark of their mothers body they were currently passing. As they passed their moms stomach Amy rolled her eyes "moms been at the pastries again I see. She's supposed to cut that stuff out. She told me she had."
Dennis looked at his mothers slightly chubby belly "She was pretty fit when she was younger. Dad said she would stress eat sometimes though." "Maybe growing up really poor makes her overcompensate" Amy suggested "Dunno how she's gonna cope at her size, how the hell's she gonna fill her belly up now? She could eat all the food on the planet and it wouldn't be enough" Amy turned to Karen who explained how they could easily use the size changing tech to feed their massive mother.

"I always thought their were diminishing returns on food and stuff as they grew?" Amy asked. "There have been major improvements to it. Your mother spared no expense" Karen replied. "Of course she didn't" Amy rolled her eyes "gotta get that savory stuff right."

Amy stared at her moms stomach and realized how truly massive it was "She could eat everything on the planet and it wouldn't make a dent". Amy gulped and shivered at the thought of her titanic mom swallowing up everything she could get her hands on.
Her moms belly gurgled as she tried to satisfy her hunger with food, buildings, people. Her mom poured untold millions down her throat but it wasn't enough, she was still hungry. Her mom held her and Dennis in her gigantic palm and licked her lips. "Hungry" she boomed and rubbed her pudgy belly "I want more, need more." Amy and Dennis screamed and begged their mother not to eat them but she didn't listen or care. They were her food now, everything was her food. "You'll be yummy in mommy's tummy" Amy and Dennis screamed again as their mom tilted her palm towards her open mouth. They tried to hold on but it was futile and they were sent screeching into the abyss of their moms mouth and were swallowed alive by the gargantuan goddess.

Her mom rubbed her stomach which growled, she wanted more. "More" she boomed and just kept eating and eating.
Even after she's eaten everything it wasn't enough "More" she bellowed and began to grow and grow. Amy saw her mom towering over the world. Her mom reached down, plucked the Earth up, popped it into her mouth and swallowed.
"I need more" she kept growing while rubbing her still gurgling stomach and she ate and ate, everything she found would be sent down her gullet, nothing would escape her belly, nothing. "More" her voice boomed across the cosmos.

Amy was jilted awake by Dennis as he took her hand "You okay?"
"Yeah I zoned out that's all" she replied. Her anxiety was increasing as they moved up and up.
15213111.title: Its been a long road

152131111.content:
"You sure, you look a bit pale?" Karen moved towards Amy. "I''m fine really, it's just we're a long way up and this transparent shit ain't helping" she lied and looked at the see through floor.
"Its perfectly safe Amy. I promise. Do think your mother would let you in this thing if it wasn't?" Karen asked.
"I Guess not, I still don't li... ah!" Amy jumped as she heard a massive gurgling noise. It was her moms stomach and it sounded hungry. Amy's phone beeped as she received a text

"Um, sorry about that honey. I'm just a bit hungry. If you can't tell my belly needs a lot of food now it's so big. Maybe we can all have dinner together. xxx mom"

Amy texted back "you made me jump mom, that was kinda terrifying you know. In the future could you please make it easier to see you? I'm not riding this thing again. Also I can tell you've been eating pastry stuff again. That's bad mom."

"I know I'll promise to sort something out for you two in future. I should have taken it into consideration how long the journey was. Is Dennis okay now? xxx mom"

"Yeah he's fine mom. Mostly anyway, I think he's still grumpy though. Also you dodged the pastry thing. Big belly or not you should take care of yourself. Please."

"I know I know. I shouldn't eat so much. But being so huge comes with very big appetite and I need lots and lots of food. I'm sorry my big belly rumble scared you. Don't worry I may be God now but I promise I won't eat you up, you might be a tiny mortal to me but you're still my daughter. Unless you misbehave, then you just might end up as a little more pudge on my mega God belly. xxx mom"

Amy looked up and saw her mom grab her stomach and squish it and rub it with her hand.

"MOM WHAT THE FUCK. THAT'S NOT FUNNY"

"I'm only joking honey. I would never ever hurt you, or your brother. You're all I really have in this world. Besides Godhood anyway. xxx mom"

"You're really taking this god thing seriously aren't you? I just want you to hug me. I just want to have a normal mom."

"Its what I am now Amy. You'll have to get used to looking up at me as God. Only God can be big and that's me alone."

Amy noticed she didn't add mom to the end this time.

"Can't you shrink down sometimes though? Its not like you can't grow big again after. Please don't leave me"

"I'm not sure about that. But I'll think about it okay? Seeing my beautiful angels face again would be nice. xxx mom"

"I'd like that. When was the last time we were properly together?"

Up above Amy's question hit Miranda hard "when was the last time I spent some real time with her? I've been so focused on this plan I forgot about my little girl. But this was ultimately necessary and I can make it up to her now. I am God and I can do anything."

"I know it's been a long time honey. I promise from now on we'll spend more time together... hopefully Dennis will be with us to? Now what do you want for dinner? xxx mom"

"I dunno, steak maybe?"
