She began speaking in a sickly sweet voice "You know big bro it would be unfortunate if someone were to just wheel you into the sea."

Brian gasped "You really shouldn't say things like that." Amy scowled at him. Dennis though, played along "You think just because I'm a cripple now I couldn't take you on? Am I gonna need to get drones of my own?" He turned his chair towards her and smirked.
"You gonna do hot wheels? You've never even used the drones before." Amy felt her mood lightening as she and her sibling jousted.
Dennis shrugged mockingly "Well if you can do it that must mean I can to and since I'm older I am no doubt superior to you."

Amy's eyes narrowed and she flipped her blonde hair over her shoulder "That a challenge?" Her brother nodded. "Okay then, we'll ask Doctor Beckett to come up with a competition or something."
"Agreed." Dennis said.

Miranda was listening to all of this and groaned "Will you two behave yourselves. Do I have to punish you both?" She bent over and began moving closer until her gorgeous face filled the window. Miranda's long, dirty blonde hair framed her face, her huge green eyes sparkled as she stared at them.

The trio inside thought she was breathtaking. Amy more than anyone thought her mom was stunning beyond words. She was also the only one in the room who saw Miranda as a true goddess.
She whistled "Damn mom, you're looking hot." This caused her mom to blush "I... thank you angel. My little girl is surely just as beautiful as her mom though." Miranda practically cooed.

Amy clammed up at her moms compliment causing Dennis to burst out laughing. Miranda heard this and started on him next "And let's not forget my handsome boy. Its no wonder Karen likes you." This shut her son up quickly.

Brian just sat there awkwardly listening to the exchange. He had no clue what to do and what was this about his ex's assistant liking Dennis?
Wasn't she far to old for him. "You're seeing someone?" he asked his son.
Dennis gave him an aloof look and nodded "Yeah, me and Karen have been seeing each other. She's been there for me a lot, she's been taking care of me while I'm sick." He had no intention of ever revealing what had caused his heat stroke, no one but him and his girlfriend would ever know.

"Isn't she a little old for you?" Brian asked Dennis and then addressed Miranda "And you're okay with this Miranda?"
Dennis said nothing while his mother spoke "Yes I'm fine with it. Dennis is old enough to make his own decisions and I trust Karen completely. I know he's in good hands with her."
Brian didn't approve of this relationship but he didn't want to start another argument. He didn't want Dennis sinking deeper into his ex wife's clutches. It was obvious at this point that Dennis would immediately side with his mother over him, he hated she'd turned his son against him.

He thought about something, he despised himself for even considering this but maybe it would help him pry Dennis away from Miranda. he had to protect his son from her though, no matter what.
"Look Miranda" he said "If we're going all out with the truth maybe its time they knew."
Miranda's eyes narrowed "What tru..." She knew where he was going. Rage began to boil inside of her "You selfish bastard" she glowered at the apartment. If Dennis and Amy weren't in there she'd pinch it between her fingers and swallow it whole.

The look of fury on Miranda's face caused Brian to recoil, maybe he'd just made an enormous mistake.

Dennis and Amy looked at each other, then at their parents. "What don't we know mom? You said you wouldn't lie to me."
Brian was scared shitless but knew he needed to press on "We should tell them. Is there really any point n keeping it a secret? If you want me to do it..."

"No" Miranda thundered, causing everyone to flinch "if anyone will tell them it'll be me." The gigantic goddess got to her feet, bathing the apartment in shadow. Everyone inside was shaking with fear at the immensely powerful woman as she seethed above them.
While Dennis and Amy had mostly gotten used to the size difference it was a moment like this that reminded them of how utterly insignificant they were compared with their massive mom.

The goddess was struggling to control her rage. She wanted to break something, she felt like growing out of this puny building and crushing it beneath her. All the goddess was seeing right now was red, her fists were balled as she tried to fight back against the tsunami of hatred washing over her.
1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.title: continued

1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"But I can't do that." she thought and calmed herself "need to protect my babies."
Miranda breathed deeply and smiled down at her children "Okay you want to know, I'm coming down there right now."
She turned on her heel, walked towards the door and disappeared though it.


Everyone in the room relaxed. Amy shifted in her seat, she had been both terrified and aroused by her moms rage as the goddess had towered over them. "This ones going in my mom folder for sure." she had taken her phone out and had been secretly recording her mom the entire time. The fact her mom had gotten angry and stood up was icing on the cake for the teenager "She's got such raw fucking power. So much dominance, we're nothing compared with her."
Amy felt moist and excused herself for a moment.

Dennis wasn't sure what to do as he and his dad sat in silence. His mom was coming in and this clearly scared his dad. "This had better be good." he said "You'd better have a good reason for making mom pissed off like that."
Brian gulped "I thought for a moment she might actually crush us."
Dennis was the one feeling angry now, he didn't let it show though and instead shrugged off his dads comment "I knew she'd never hurt us. Guess you're lucky me and Amy were here huh?"
His dad didn't respond and instead looked out the window. Dread was starting to fill him as he hoped he hadn't just made a catastrophic mistake.

A few minutes later Amy returned and sat back down. She fidgeted and twirled her hair as they waited for Miranda to arrive.

They heard the front door open, Brian was getting more and more nervous. Then she was there, standing in the doorway, Miranda smiled at her children and walked in. She knelt down and hugged her wheelchair bound son "Hey honey."
"Hey mom" Dennis gladly accepted his mothers affection. Miranda then sat on the couch next to Amy who wrapped her arms around her.

"You want a drink Miranda?" Karen yelled from the kitchen. Dennis and Amy were confused. "Wait" Dennis said "How is Karen still in here if you are?" Amy just tilted her head.
Miranda explained what they'd done "The whole money equals size system is gone now. Its all been shut down and now I can control my size at will."
Amy laughed happily "So it'll be easier for you to come see us and now Karen can spend that time with us to." She was glad none of them had to be separated anymore, she was definitely glad that the old system was dead, hopefully forever."
Dennis was equally happy he could be with his mom and his girlfriend at the same time. He hoped he could talk them into having a party to celebrate sometime.

Miranda noticed the only one who didn't seem all that excited was Brian "So here we are." she gave him a cold look "I guess we should get on with this then."
Brian nodded. He was clearly regretting bringing it up but she was in no way letting him back out now, he'd brought this on himself.
Dennis looked between his parents before asking his mom what this was all about "So you going to explain whatever this thing is?" He saw the pain in his moms eyes as he asked, whatever it was it must have been bad.

Miranda gathered herself and began to explain "When I was pregnant with...." tears came to her eyes as she talked. Amy gripped her hand "Its okay mom."
Miranda thanked her and went on, she needed to get this over with "When I was pregnant with you Dennis you.... you weren't the only one."
"Only one?" Dennis wasn't sure what she was getting at but could tell it was killing her to talk about.
"I mean it wasn't just you inside me. You had a twin sister." Miranda's voice was cracking as she spoke.
Dennis and Amy were gobsmacked "I had a twin?" Dennis gasped "What hap..." He stopped when he realized what she was probably about to tell him.

Miranda could see Dennis knew where this was going "When I gave I gave birth to you both, she... she..." Miranda broke down and began sobbing. Amy flung her arms around her mother and tried to comfort her "Mom I..." she didn't now what to say. She would have had an older sister "I'm so sorry mom."

Dennis was speechless. He couldn't begin to imagine the pain his mom must have felt, was still feeling. He felt pain himself but at least he didn't have any memory's of what happened. "I had a twin..." he whispered and put his head in his hands.
Dennis felt a dull ache inside him, as if being told about his deceased twin had ripped open a wound inside him, like he was now missing part of himself. Then he felt anger. Not towards his mother for her silence but towards his father for forcing this upon them.

Dennis glared at his dad through tear stained eyes "What exactly did you think this would accomplish?" he snarled "Did you think I'd be angry at mom for not saying anything?"
Brian was taken aback by his sons anger, this had blown up in his face "I thought you needed to know the truth. Its part of the reason your mother and I split up."

Amy joined in the attack on their father "Really? cause from the look on your face you were expecting us to blow up at mom. Is this just another way of you getting back at her for leaving? What the fuck is wrong with you?" Amy tried not to scream, not wanting to upset her crying mom anymore than she already was. The darker part of Amy wanted to tell her mom to unleash her rage and pain. To let herself grow larger and more powerful than ever before. To rule this world with an iron fist and make them all worship her as she swelled into the undisputed goddess of the universe.

Miranda's face was aching from crying. She was feeling both angry and hurt at having to think about her dead daughter, she wanted to strangle her ex right here for what he'd done.
"There you happy now?" she spat at him "You happy you've managed to hurt me one more time? I hope it was worth it. I need some air..."
She got up and walked out, heading towards the bedrooms so she could go outside. Amy jumped up and followed her.

Dennis and Brian sat in silence. Brian understood he may have just permanently damaged his relationship with his children.
"To think I thought you ever really cared about me." Dennis said, his voice barely above a whisper "All these years, all there years it was about getting back at mom."
Brian tired to defend himself "That's not true I..." Dennis cut him off "I'm not interested. I think you should go home before this gets any worse, I'll ask Karen to arrange a ride for you." Dennis left his father alone.

Outside Amy found her mother sitting on a deck chair staring out at the sea. "I sometimes thought about how I might tell you two someday. About your sister." Miranda spoke as Amy approached her. She was obviously still pissed off.
"You want to trash something right now don't you?" Amy said and rested her chin on her mothers shoulder. The sweet smell of her moms perfume and shampoo filled her nostrils.
Miranda chuckled "It that obvious? I want to grow and grow right now, to take my anger out on the world."
Amy adopted a joking tone, not wanting to give away she was being slightly genuine "Maybe you should grow. Show the world who's God, it'll be better off under you anyway."

Miranda could tell in spite of trying to hide it, Amy meant some of what she was saying "You really think so? Should I truly rule everything as a god?"
Amy dropped any pretenses of joking this time and stood in front of her mother "yes" she stated, looking Miranda dead in the eye.
"You'd be okay with that?" her mom looked uncertain but Amy pushed on. "Yes I'd be okay with that. I honestly feel safe knowing its you in control, I said before I'm glad I'll never lose anyone ever again because of you. I'm happy you're going to rule over us all"

Miranda's face went from uncertainty to shock "Angel I will not be ruling over you and Dennis. You're my children, I'm your mother. I am absolutely not your God."
Amy nodded "You know what I meant mom. But seriously, I think you should do it. The sooner the world accepts you as its goddess the easier it'll be on everyone. Its you that has all the power now so that means everything is yours."
Miranda had no idea where all this had suddenly come from. She'd never heard Amy talk like this before and yet she could hear it in her daughters voice "You believe every word you're saying don't you angel? You want me to be a goddess."

Amy hoped she was pressing the right buttons as she nudged her mother to embrace her divinity "Yes mom. I mean all of it."
"And how would you suggest I go about enforcing my will on the outside world? Not everyone wants to live here unlike all your friends and their family's." her mom asked.
"If they reject your gifts they can go fuck themselves. If they don't want to live in paradise that's their problem, they don't deserve what you're offering." Amy was burning with passion as she talked to her mom, she'd never been so certain of anything in her life "You should make it clear that anyone who remains outside is on their own from now on."

Amy's words filled Miranda with pride. Her daughter believed in her, in her role in the world. "Very well angel. I will make sure the world truly knows who its ruler is from now on and you will be by my side all the way." Amy was filling with glee at her words. "From now on" Miranda smirked "I'll make them all bow before me."

Amy squealed and jumped into her mothers lap "You're gonna be such an awesome goddess mom. No one can stop you now."
Miranda held her daughter tightly. Amy was right, the sooner they did this the better. "Mine."
1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Revelations : Miranda calms down

1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Miranda and Amy returned to the living room and found Brian all by himself. Amy made a disgusted noise and walked back out, leaving Miranda and her ex alone.
"You just couldn't help yourself could you?" Miranda said as she seated herself "You had to piss it all away, and for what? Did you hope to turn them against me?"
Brian looked at her but said nothing. She could see the regret in his eyes, he realized how badly he'd fucked up.

"You know I thought about crushing you because of what you've done, all you've done, but seeing you here, now. You're just a sad man who isn't worth my time, the only worthwhile thing you ever did for me was giving me two amazing children." the contempt in Miranda's voice was palpable
"Did you even really come here to see how Dennis was?"

Brian winced at her accusation "You really think so little of me?" His ex wife cackled "You surprised? After all the pain you've caused, not just me, but Dennis and Amy. You can't still be that ignorant."
She couldn't be bothered to scream at him anymore, he wasn't worth the energy "If only you'd supported me all those years ago. Was it so bad I wanted to make our lives better? You think it was only ever about me being bigger?"

Brian wasn't sure he should answer this one at first but decided it would be better if he was honest "Yes. I thought it was consuming you. You were constantly talking about wanting to be the biggest person ever, I thought if it ever happened you'd forget about the rest of us."
Miranda glared at him but let him go on.
"It seemed nothing else interested you, like you didn't care who you crushed along the way on your quest for size and money. Maybe I should be ashamed I even thought you'd crush your family under your foot if you needed to."

From the way Miranda was looking at him he thought she might start hitting him. "I would never hurt them" she hissed "I will protect them no matter what."
"Do you really see yourself as some sort of deity?" Brian questioned "Will you always see them as your children?"
"I am a goddess now. This world is mine forever and as Amy so lovingly pointed out no one can stop me. She supports me, she thinks I deserve to rule everything." Miranda wore a smug grin of victory on her face.

Brian couldn't believe his daughter was supporting her mothers madness. "She's poisoned that girls mind" he thought "She's gone insane, she can't really believe what she's saying." Brian was scared of what the blonde bombshell had planned for them all.

Miranda relished the look of horror painted on her puny ex's face. She had no interest in killing him anymore, she instead wanted him to live in her shadow, knowing that she'd won. "This planet will be better off under me." she declared arrogantly "Its infinitely better than what came before it."
"What happens to people who don't want your rule? You'll force it on them?"
"They will all accept me eventually. They will all bow before me as their supreme ruler and learn to love it."
"Do even know what you sound like?"

Miranda threw back her head a gave a belly laugh "I sound powerful that's what. I am powerful, more than anyone else in history. I..." She looked towards the door and saw Dennis there, an amused look on his face.
Brian turned around "Are you listening to this? You need to get away from her."
"Nah" Dennis said "I think the world will be better off with mom in charge. I doubt it will be necessary to force anyone here, if we show everyone the lives they could have in this place they'll flock to it. And no one can hurt me anymore, ever."

Brian was distraught "What the hell has she done to you? She's completely poisoned you, you know this isn't...."
"Wrong!" Dennis bellowed "The only one who's been poisoning me is you. You kept me isolated my entire life, you made sure I was dependent on you so I wouldn't leave." He was feeling woozy after shouting and had to catch his breath "I think its time you left, your rides here."

Brian looked to Miranda who was busy staring out the window and then to his son. Dennis simply gestured towards the door, saying nothing.
The defeated man got to his feet and walked out meeting Karen who escorted him to whatever vehicle would take him home.

Dennis was shaking. Conflicting emotions were raging round inside of him, he was mentally exhausted and it wasn't even midday yet. Dennis wanted to scream and cry but he just didn't have the energy, everything was changing so fast and he was struggling to handle it.
A shadow fell across him. His mother knelt down and gently pulled him against her "Its okay honey, I know it must be hard for you. He did raise you so it can't be easy letting him go."

Dennis fell fully into his moms embrace "You really going all out with the god thing then?"
"Yes" she whispered in his ear "I can do this, I'll make the world a better place I promise. I need you and Amy to support me in this."
Dennis nodded, he didn't want to resist, he had no energy to do so. "Are you willing to go all the way with this? I doubt it'll be as easy as just telling everyone this is the way things are now. It'll get pretty ugly before its over."
"I'll go as far as I have to honey. Don't be afraid, the world is mine now. People just have to accept that fact, they'll all bow down to me because I'm God." Miranda caressed his face "but I'll always be your mommy."

Dennis was so tired he fell asleep in his moms arms "My baby is so tired huh." She got up and began wheeling him into his bedroom.
"Is he gone?" she heard Amy's voice behind her. "Yes he's gone. Whether either of you want to see him again is up to you."
Amy was not interested "I don't want anything to do with the sperm donor. Hopefully Dennis won't either."
1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.title: No going back

1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Miranda sat on the edge of Dennis's bed and watched him sleep. "He's so peaceful." she whispered and thought about all the times she missed out on this as he was growing up. "Don't think about that right now. Time to leave the past behind and make new memories."
She wanted to forget about the pain of her past, from now on she only wanted to think of their future together as a family.

"You okay?" Miranda looked towards the door to see Karen standing there, a thoughtful smile on her face.
"I think so. I just hope Dennis will be to." she got up and stepped onto the balcony, followed by Karen.
Karen put her hand on Miranda's shoulder "It must of been horrible to relive all that." she said "I can't imagine what you must of gone through."

The blonde goddess gazed at the horizon as she fought back against the urge to cry again "I never wanted to think about what happened ever again.... I wonder if she would have loved all this." So many times throughout the last 17 years she'd often come across things that made her ask if her daughter would have liked them. But Miranda knew she'd never find out, no matter how much she wanted to.

Even though Karen had known Miranda a long time she hadn't known about the loss of a baby. The fact Dennis had once had a twin was just as shocking to her as it was to the others. "If she was anything like Dennis I'm sure she would have. I hate to ask but... what happened?"

Miranda wanted to shut down instead of discussing it, but maybe she needed to talk "When I gave birth to them..." she took a deep breath "my baby girl had a weak heart they said. At the time I was still pretty poor and small, we couldn't afford a treatment that would have saved her life."
Miranda gripped the balcony so hard her knuckles turned white "Those bastards said they couldn't save her unless we paid for it.."

Karen felt tears stinging her eyes. She'd known places for poorer people could be harsh but the idea they'd refuse to save a child disgusted her. "They just let her die?" Miranda nodded silently.
Karen felt anger bubbling up in side her "You have any idea where the people who did that are now?"
"I thought about searching for them so many times. To make them pay for what they did... but it meant remembering I'd lost my little Danielle." Miranda lowered her head and cried.
She felt Karen's strong arms envelope her, she didn't resist.

"I'm sorry. I shouldn't have brought it up." Karen comforted her friend. She knew what she was going to do. The gorgeous fiery redhead was going to find the ones responsible for taking that girl away from their family, "These guys are my family", and make them suffer.
Karen didn't know exactly what she'd do when she found them but it was not something those little shits would enjoy. That she would make certain of.

Inside, Amy was sitting in her brothers wheelchair next to his bed and listening in on the conversation outside. The fact there were people who could have saved her sisters life and didn't "Because of fucking money. Sick fucking cunts, if I ever find you I'll have my drones slowly skin you alive."
The young teenager was shaking furiously. She was going to ask Karen help her find them, unaware that she was planning the same thing, and make them all pay.
Amy looked at her sleeping brother. She had no intention on dragging him into this, not in the condition he was in. "I'll find them bro. I promise."

Amy wasn't usually interested in being a giantess but the idea appealed to her right now. She imagined herself towering over the ones who'd let her sister die and forcing them to worship her. She would degrade them in any way she could think of.
The only food they were allowed to eat was the dirt under her toenails, the only thing they could drink was her sweat and spit.
Amy would make them suck the sweat from her underwear after she'd been working out in it for hours.

Amy laughed as she dropped her drenched stinking panties onto her slaves "Another gift for you today shit stains. I've been really going at it today so there's no shortage of yummy liquid for you, drink up now and...." She felt something wriggling in her sweaty ass crack and fished an emaciated woman from inside it.
Amy brought the tiny woman to her nose and sniffed "wow you smell ripe today. You having fun back there?" The tiny woman nodded, knowing its what was expected of her.
Amy smiled and cheerfully said "Well that's great, cause I just love you being in there to. Say bye bye to your fellow shit stains." The woman whimpered as the cruel goddess unceremoniously shoved her back between her rank cheeks.

A shadow fell across the young blonde and she looked up. "Good evening my goddess" she then prostrated herself before the immense form of her mother.
"Evening angel. Are you carrying out your duties for your goddess?" her mom thundered. As large as Amy was right now, she was still nothing compared to the enormity of her divine parent. Amy's goddess filled the horizon as she held the world in the palm of her hand.
"Yes goddess. They are suffering just as you commanded." Amy beamed and clenched her round booty, earning a squeak from its occupant

"Very good my little angel. Ensure you keep it up, I'm relying on you down there." Miranda boomed and began lowering the Earth back to it's usual resting place in the vast jungle of her pubic hair. Amy and everyone else's sinuses were filled with the powerful aroma of their goddesses pussy, her pheromone's drove them wild.

Amy breathed in deeply, letting her goddesses scent fill her up. The she turned her attention back to the slaves in her used panties "You little shit stains can't do anything right can you?" she roared and scooped them up along with her underwear.
"You know what happens if you don't do what I tell you." Amy sneered at them and began concentrating on shrinking them smaller.
Her slaves begged for mercy as they started to dwindle into the fiber's of her stinking panties. Once she felt they were small enough she stepped into the leg holes of her undies, dragged them up her legs and wiggled them over her hips.

Once the panties were snugly in place, Amy pushed the back of them into her ass. She knew she stank today and was getting horny over the fact she was torturing her slaves with it. She bent over and let out a rancid fart, making the lives of those trapped against her even more hellish than before.
"Oh yeah" Amy moaned as she slid her hand beneath the waistband of her panties and played with herself.


"Amy?" came a voice "Amy you there?"
Amy was snapped back to reality by Karen's hand waving in front of her face.
Karen grinned at her and said "You looked like you were a million miles away babe. You okay?"
"Uh, yeah" Amy rapidly responded and gave an awkward smile "Um, where's mom?"
Karen pointed outside "She's sitting out there." Karen gave Amy an expectant look "So what did you hear exactly? I assume you've been here the whole time."

Amy sighed "I heard about how my sister died. That she could have been saved but mom didn't have enough money... So those stupid shit stains let her die." Amy's fists were balled as the rage returned. She looked up at Karen "I want to find them. I want to hurt them and I want you to help me."

Karen was taken aback by Amy's sudden burst of anger. The malice in her eyes was something Karen had never seen from her before.
"Amy I don't think you should.."
"Help me, please Karen. I'm going to do this no matter what and it'll be easier if I have you backing me up." Amy pleaded.

"I'd be a hypocrite if I warned her off from doing this" Karen thought "If I try and do this without her she'll be pissed at me for who knows how long." She relented and agreed to bring Amy along with her. "Fine, but you will keep this between us okay? Your mom and Dennis have enough shit on their plate right now so it's up to us."
Amy quickly agreed to keep her mouth shut if it meant they'd get at the people who, as far as she was concerned, murdered her sister.


As Amy and Karen discussed how they'd approach their mission they unaware that someone was listening in on them.

Dennis kept his eyes shut as he heard his loved ones talk. "What the hell are they gonna do if they find them?" he wondered.
1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Moving on

1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Dennis listened intently to the two girls as they talked about tracking down those they saw as responsible for his twins death. He gave no indication that he was awake and eavesdropping on them, he actually felt a little happy that they where doing this. His twins death represented everything wrong with the old world and why his mom being a goddess now would make it a better place.
"Am I actually supporting this?" he asked himself in relation to his moms plans. A week ago he could never have dreamed of encouraging his own mother to basically conquer the planet and yet here he was doing exactly that. "Funny how that works."

It occurred to him there was one thing he'd failed to ask his mother "I wonder what her name was... Should I risk bringing it up again?" he didn't want to cause his mom anymore pain then she was already feeling, and yet the need to know about his twin sister compelled him to seek the answer out.
Dennis groaned loudly to let his girlfriend and sister know he was awake and rolled over. His blonde hair was scruffy from his small nap and his throat was dry. He smiled at the two women beside his bed "What ya talkin about?"

Karen reached over and ruffled her boyfriends hair "Just talking about our plans for the future that's all." She was hardly lying to him when she said this "You sound like you could use a drink, be right back." She stood and went to fetch something from the kitchen.

This left Dennis and Amy alone. He took the opportunity to pick his sisters brain "You think Its a good idea if I ask mom what our sister was called?"
"I uh heard mom and Karen outside. her name was Danielle" Amy said and divulged everything she'd heard about their sisters death. The teenager hesitated for a moment, she knew that she'd agreed with Karen to keep tracking down those who refused to save her sisters life from Dennis a secret.
"I can't lie to him" she wrestled with her thoughts "He's been lied to all his life and I don't want to be just another liar." She didn't want to go behind Karen's back like this but she felt she had no choice. She would not do that to her brother.

"Um, Dennis. Karen and I are going to..." before Amy could continue her brother held up his hand.
"I know what you and her are planning Amy." he said, smiling. "I heard you talking. Thank you for being honest with me, it means a lot."

When Karen returned Amy immediately informed her that Dennis had overheard them talking. "Oh right well.... I'm sorry I was going to keep you in the dark babe. Its just with your current condition."
"Its okay. I know you're just worried about me but you don't need to treat me like I'm a fragile flower now." Dennis accepted the drink she'd brought for him and took a large gulp.

Dennis chuckled as he remembered what he'd been considering before learning about his twin.
"I was looking forward to celebrating being being with you and mom at the same time." he told Karen "I hoped we could have a party or something... guess that's been ruined today."

"Why should we let this day be ruined for us?" a voice came from outside. The trio looked up as Miranda walked in and sat on the bed.
"I don't want to let things feel even worse for you than they already are my boy." Miranda said and held his hand in hers "You're right that this is something worth celebrating, we're all together now, exactly how it should be."

Dennis hoped she wasn't doing this just for his sake. He didn't want her to have to put on a brave face if she was still really hurting inside.
"You sure mom? You don't have.." "No, insist honey. we should be making new happy memories with each other. So.."
Miranda turned her attention to Amy "Why don't you get those friends of yours up here and I'll invite some guests of my own. That's if you two don't mind us partying here, its your place."

"Of course its fine mom." Amy beamed and leapt out of the wheelchair to go grab her phone and call her friends. Dennis agreed with his sisters enthusiasm and gave his mom a thumbs up.

Miranda felt better now she had something else to focus on as she made some calls. She wanted to thank a few people for their help in recent days.



Meanwhile deep inside Miranda's ass crack the inhabitants of the prison spheres weren't feeling quite so relaxed. Inside one of the prisons, June was engaged in her midday prayers to the goddess above along with everyone else. She'd been in here for days at this point, being forced to devote herself to some psychopathic monster who'd kidnapped her and her family.
June would never make her feelings known out loud of course, she'd seen what happened to those who defied Gods will.

"I am unworthy of the gift our God has given me. I am unworthy of living inside her divine and glorious body." June praised. When she'd learnt exactly where they were she'd puked all over the floor. The young blonde girl was still struggling to come to terms with what had become of her life. She was going to be a doctor, she wanted to make sure that she could save people. People like her biological mother who had died giving birth to her.
Now at the ripe old age of 17 she was a slave to some insane bimbo and forced to worship her as a god.

"I am nothing but an insignificant piece of dirt beneath Gods notice." June droned on "I am eternally grateful she has allowed me to exist in the paradise of her... glorious ass." June felt sick each time she said those words. This wasn't supposed to be her life, she wasn't supposed to be a slave, living like some sort of bacteria in the ass crack of a mad woman.

Megan sat behind the two goddess sisters and watched as they touched each others asses. She was turned on by the sexy mega blondes and felt the overwhelming urge to worship them both. Maybe she could have two goddesses now.

The drone obeyed and struck out with an appendage that pierced the doctors neck. At first he screamed and clawed at the drone but eventually he became silent, and docile. June had created new nanites that entered the brain and made people slaves to her will.

The goddess had been feeling incredibly cruel when making the tiny machines. The nanites took control of people but left them very much aware of what was happening to them but they were incapable of defying June's commands.

Doctor Beckett wanted to scream as June ordered him to bring his assistants to the drone. He would cry if he could but was helpless to resist this monster of a woman's order.

"I'm not." a monstrous voice boomed around him.

June was in his head, towering over the entire world, her eyes blazed with cosmic fire as she laughed.
"Don't you see foolish scum? I am the almighty goddess of the universe and soon everyone will know my power. Soon all will submit to my will."
Not all would become like the doctor, many would end up in June's stomach as she conquered humanity.

The goddesses eyes lit up as her cute crush walked in. This was perfect, she wanted to make him her consort.
She needed to get rid of that pesky free will first though, but not before seducing him the old fashioned way.
June swung her shapely hips as she walked towards Kyle. She was currently a full head taller than he was and licked her lips, a look of lust in her eyes.

"Hey there cute guy." the divine blonde purred.
Kyle tried to step back but June pulled him towards her and forced his face into her cleavage.
"You're so hot Kyle. I just want to make you mine babe, I will make you mine." the goddess whispered to the struggling emo. "Don't resist me babe, give in and make love to your goddess."

The usually upbeat emo was freaking out as the oversized girl held him in an inescapable grip. Goddess? What the hell was she talking about? He wasn't going to cheat on Mel.
Kyle couldn't help but get an erection as he was smothered by June's epic tits, the scent of her gorgeous body assaulted his nose. He found her incredibly sexy but he loved Mel.

June's eyes rolled into the back of her head as she and Kyle came. The emo whimpered as he ejaculated inside her, tears streamed down his face.
"Don't pretend you didn't love that you sexy little thing." the amoral teen goddess whispered in his ear and licked his cheek. She forcibly kissed him, shoving her tongue into his mouth.

Deep inside the belly of the goddess, Amy was sweating as she held the force field in place. She wasn't sure how long she'd be able to keep this up, even she would run out of energy eventually.
Megan cuddled her girlfriend and gave her all the support she could.

"I am going to kill that backstabbing cunt." Amy hissed for the umpteenth time. Her own sister had betrayed her after shrinking them. Then the bitch had the audacity to eat her and her fucking city. A city where the only reason they hadn't been digested yet was because of Amy's protection.
The fact they were so small made it easier to maintain the bubble surrounding them but it was hardly a long term solution. She needed to get them out of here.

1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.title: continued

1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
There was screaming, so much screaming. The streets were choked by dust and smoke as the monster tore through skyscrapers in search of more food.

Thousands lay dead. Many had been crushed to a bloody unrecognizable pulp inside massive footprints, many had died as buildings collapsed with them inside or upon them in the street below.
And so, so, many had been devoured by the rampaging blonde monster, sentenced to a cruel and painful death inside her stomach.

The people of the nameless city had rejoiced as they felt themselves return to a normal size. As they celebrated in the streets their elation soon turned to horror and panic as a gigantic nude woman appeared at the edge of the city.
She smiled and said nothing as she took her fist steps among the buildings, uncaring of who or what she crushed beneath her bare soles.

The giantess must have been at least 750m tall as she ripped open the first skyscraper and started eating its occupants. The only noises she made were moans of satisfaction and deep, powerful, laughter as people exploded under her feet while she walked.
The massive teen even got down on her hands and knees and dragged her tongue through a jam packed street, slurping up hundreds of cars and those inside them. She moaned as she chewed the metallic treats and their soft gooey centers, blood dribbled down her chin.

Some futilely tried to attack the devourer with guns but only succeeded in making her roll eyes and giggle.

Just when they thought it couldn't get any worse the immense blonde sat down, laughed, and started to grow. Her laughter became more powerful and gained more bass as her ass crushed large sections of the city and any survivors under its swelling cheeks.
When she reached 10km in height she stopped growing and grinned hungrily at the remaining structures between her legs. The giantess was clearly getting aroused as a strong smell began wafting from her moistening cunt.


June was happily plucking the remaining buildings from the city below and tossing them into her mouth. As much as she liked being up close and personnel when eating the worthless scum she had things to do.
The goddess relished their screams as she consumed the entire population. June had grown this city back to what should have been its natural height so she could have more fun as a giantess.

She could have shrunk down but it just wouldn't have felt right, she would have known how small she truly was even if she towered over the city and its people. That was unacceptable to her, if she was going to be a gigantic goddess then she had to be gigantic.

Unbeknownst to the goddess, the more she used her enhancements the worse her mental state would become.


Amy could see and hear the people June had been eating from the city outside as they fell though the opening to her belly. She didn't really give a shit about them but it was rather distracting. It got even worse as whole skyscrapers plummeted into the goddesses gastric juices.

They'd been trapped in June's stomach for a few days now and Amy was getting weaker. She'd instructed the drones she still had to try and teleport them out of her sisters gurgling gut but they were struggling. June's own enhancements were messing with things, preventing them form getting a decent lock on an appropriate destination.

Some of the teen goddesses faithful followers had sacrificed themselves to Amy's maw to give her more energy and bye everyone else more time to get free. But it was only delaying the inevitable.

Another twelve hours passed and the drones hit upon a potential solution. Whenever June teleported herself it made a brief opening for them to slip free with their own devices. It would require split second timing, a single mistake could rip them apart or merge them with June's titanic body.

Amy did not like the idea of potentially being absorbed into her cunt sisters ass, although if the idea had occurred a week ago it would have turned her on. Part of her was still turned on by becoming one with her goddess of a sisters flawless cheeks, but it was overwhelmed by Amy's raw hatred for the traitorous bitch.

One more day passed before an opportunity presented itself. The next time June transported herself the drones were ready and shifted them through space and out into the fresh air of a hillside.

Amy collapsed from exhaustion as she let the force field drop. There were cheers and thanks as the city's population praised their goddess Amy.
The goddess was being cradled by her girlfriend as they waited for the drones to take them home.

Megan was terrified of losing Amy, her goddess looked almost completely drained and was barely conscious
She demanded the drones hurry up and take them back to the palace, they had to get help.

One more jump and they were deposited in Amy's secret lab. Or what was left of it anyway. June, it would seem, had gone to town on the lab and now it lay in ruins.
Amy teared up as she looked around and saw her pets wrecked beyond repair "My baby's..."

Fortunately there were some undamaged power cells inside them, which Amy drained dry to recharge herself.
A tingling occurred at the back of Amy's mind and she spun around to find one of the smaller drones, it had manged to hide from June's destructive rampage.

The goddess scooped it up and held it close like it was her own child. She connected with it and watched what had transpired when June had come here. Amy felt new rage building inside her as she saw June tear apart her baby's and destroy her work. Obviously the older goddess didn't want to risk someone challenging her.

Then the drone showed Amy something that made her jaw drop and caused her to feel a monolithic amount of guilt. The drones had scanned June and found there was something wrong with her.

"I did this..." Amy whimpered as tears poured from her eyes. Her enhancements weren't compatible with June's body, they'd started damaging her sisters mind, and they would eventually kill her if she wasn't stopped.

Megan only heard Amy's words and tried to comfort her "Its not your fault, maybe this was who she was all along."
Amy shook her head "You don't understand. The technology was designed to work with my body, June's is rejecting it and its making her insane."
Her girlfriend was stunned. "So how do we fix her?" she eventually said.

Amy wasn't sure if she could. The only real way to stop this was to disable the technology now ravaging her sisters body and she did have one way of doing it.

When Megan had suggested Amy make a fail safe in case June ever turned on them she did exactly that. Luckily the device she'd made was still intact and functioning. Now she had to get close enough to June to use it.


Back at home, everyone was worried sick about Amy, and now even Kyle had disappeared. Mel had come to Karen distraught and became even worse when she head of Amy's disappearance.

No one suspected June, who played the role of worried sister expertly.

Kyle had been seen entering the lab but no one saw him leave. Doctor Beckett and his assistants had been questioned but they were helpless to inform anyone of June's actions.
Beckett had screamed and screamed in the vain hope that Karen would hear his thoughts somehow.
Instead all he got was the goddesses indomitable will crushing down on him.

Miranda was heartbroken at Amy being gone. She'd searched every prison across her body but found no sign of her missing daughter. On the other hand she had located June's adoptive parents and released them for her eldest girl.

Even June's loving parents weren't safe from the mad goddess and soon found themselves shrunken and at her feet. They couldn't comprehend how the girl they'd raised could be so cruel.
In June's twisted mind they deserved it for not being aware of where she'd really come from.

"Oh come now mommy, your goddess is being very patient with you because she loves you so much. I wont ask again, clean my asshole with your tongue." the deranged goddess commanded as she tortured her mother with her sweaty ass.
Her father was stuck under her left big toenail, she'd ordered him to eat any dirt he found.

Kyle was being held prisoner in a necklace around June's neck. She brought him out every night and forced herself on him, slowly wearing away at his will to resist her.
"You are mine sexy boy. You'll be mine forever because I want it." the goddess growled sexually.

Tonight she was using Amy's bed to ride him. Kyle was humiliated by the psycho blonde raping him in the bed of the friend she'd eaten.

Unfortunately, for her, Mel stumbled in on June fucking her boyfriend. She saw Kyle's sobbing face but before she could say anything she found herself shrinking rapidly.

Mel screamed as the massive June reached down for her and licked her lips before raising the tiny girl to her mouth and swallowing her alive.
1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.title: June the devourer

1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Amy, along with Megan, teleported into her room just in time to see June eat her best friend.
Time stood still for the younger goddess as she tried to process what she'd witnessed.

Amy had come here to save her sister with the device in her hand but she wasn't thinking about that now. Right now all she could see is red.

June was shocked to see her sister alive and well "How did y..." Before she could finish, something collided with her face.
Amy's fist collided with June's face, sending the older sister through the wall and out onto the beach. She had dropped the device and was seething with hatred as she launched herself after her sister.

Megan focused on helping Kyle up, his body was bruised badly from June's constant abuse. The emo teen was sobbing after watching the love of his life being eaten. His heart had just been ripped out of him.

June barely got to her feet before Amy was on her again. Her sister was every bit her equal in power but, unfortunately for the elder goddess, Amy was a much better fighter.
She was sent flying again as Amy grabbed her leg and spun her around, June landed hard and gasped for air. This couldn't be happening.

Amy allowed her sister to get to her feet and turn around before she plowed her fist into June's stomach.

The older goddess puked, the contents of her stomach spewed from her mouth and onto the warm sand. Amy spotted Mel, she was barely alive.
Before she could get her friend a growing a June grabbed her hair and slammed her into the ground.

June smiled as Amy impacted the sand. Her sister was foolish to concern herself with the well being of a worthless mortal instead of pressing the advantage.
"You impress me sis." June spoke as she kept her growth going. "I'm amazed you escaped my belly, but you still haven't learnt how to be a real goddess."
The swelling blonde raised her foot and prepared to crush Mel beneath it.

The giant goddess had forgotten just how nimble Amy could be and before her foot could come down, June was knocked backwards as her sister rammed into her jaw.
While June fell, Amy quickly scooped up the badly burned Mel and ran towards her bedroom.

Dennis and Karen had run out to see what the hell the noise was just in time to see Amy punch June across the beach. They watched the rest of the short fight before Amy picked something up and started running.

"Amy!" Dennis yelled and ran to meet her "What the fuck is going on?"
Amy grabbed Dennis with her free hand and dragged him with her. "June's gone crazy and she ate Mel."
Karen caught this and gasped as she saw the tiny form of Mel in Amy's hand "Oh god..."

Amy gave Mel to Dennis after they'd reached the house and told him and Karen about June's implants and what had happened.
Karen went pale and pointed behind Amy, June was getting up and starting to grow again.

"You really need to learn how to follow through little sis." June boomed as her growth accelerated "You concern yourself with insects instead of focusing on being a goddess like you should." The growing goddess thought for a moment before making her sister an offer "You can still join me you know. You have the drive Amy and I'm willing to help you achieve your full potential. I'll wait outside for your answer, and if you don't come I'm gonna eat the whole building."

With a flash the goddess was gone.

Amy growled and turned her focus back to Mel. She knew what she was doing now and vomited a small amount of nanites onto her tiny friends body. The machines got to work on healing Mel and Amy prepared to follow June.

Karen put he hand on Amy's shoulder before she left "You're going to fight her on your own?"
The blonde goddess nodded "This is my fault, she's like this because I was short sighted and let us both get carried away."

Before Amy could leave she saw Megan, carrying Kyle in her arms, jogging towards them. Kyle was holding the fail safe device.
"You're gonna need this." her girlfriend said.

Kyle said nothing, he looked completely broken. That is until Dennis showed him Mel.
The emo almost jumped out of Megan's arms but she held him firmly.
"You aren't in any position to walk mister." the strong brunette said. "Besides it looks like she'll be okay. Right?"

Dennis smiled and handed the tiny form of Mel to her boyfriend. Kyle cradled her gently as Megan took them back inside.
"Good luck" she called over her shoulder "Make sure you come back to me. I love you."

Amy was filled with determination "I love you to babe." The goddess said farewell to her family and tracked June. Once she found where her sister was she teleported to meet her.


Amy looked around for her sister as she grew herself. A shadow fell across her and she turned to see June, her sister was massive, bigger than their mom.

"I'm glad you came to see me sis. I realized when I saw you it would be better if you were around." the mountainous goddess thundered as she watched her sister grow. "If you're thinking of using that toy of yours, don't bother. I fixed your little back door a few days ago."

Amy felt herself filling with dread.

"And." June continued "I know about the implants fucking with my head. I fixed them to."

"Then why the fuck are you acting like this?" Amy cried. Her plan had failed before it began.

"Because we're goddesses Amy. We can do whatever we please and no one could stop us. Be with me babe, I'll even leave your friends and family alone if you join me." the older goddess smiled warmly.

As Amy reached June's height she could see the palace, it was nothing compared with how big they were. She and June could see the curvature of the planet.

"Look at us sis, then look at how utterly insignificant the mortals are." June pressed on "We belong up here, together. I'm sorry I ate you babe." She moved forward and slid her arms around her clearly conflicted sisters waist.

Amy froze as June embraced her. She was so torn on what to do, if she joined with June would her family hate her? But joining June in ruling everything was such a tempting offer.
Then she thought about what would happen if they fought. The destruction the two goddesses would cause would be catastrophic. If she was with June she could keep her loved ones safe.
As Amy gazed over the world below, she came to a decision.

"You're right June." Amy said and kissed her sister. "We're goddesses and its time everyone bowed before us." she continued.
June kissed her sister back and giggled "Yes babe, you and me above them all where we belong."

They heard the two titanic sisters speak and couldn't believe it. Inside the palace the girls friends and family were confused and afraid.
Miranda and Karen could no longer grow themselves, June had rendered all the size changing tech useless.
Now only the teenage titanesses could change anyone's size. They were all helpless and at the girls mercy.

"First things first June." Amy said, she wanted make things clear here and now. "Our family and my friends are not to be harmed ever again, and you will say sorry to them if you want me with you."

June agreed, it wasn't a huge ask considering what she was getting in return.

Amy's words put her family at ease. She was willing to protect them still and that meant a lot.

"I think its time we put the whole palace project to rest." June boomed and looked at the building below them.
Amy agreed with this, it was time to let the mortals back into the world where they belonged. "Fine but we're keeping the palace, I still want to live in there."

Miranda was disappointed with hearing that, but she was in no position to argue. Her daughters were the gods now. That filled her with a bit of pride.

The two giantesses communed with each other through their implants. They didn't want the mortals hearing their discussion.
"So we agree that the humans will all be normal sized from now on." Amy said "Size changing stuff is to much of a problem to leave out in the world."
June agreed "Okay. Then we agree that everyone will bow before us, even our family's and friends will treat us like the goddesses we are. They will worship and revere us. No exceptions."

With reluctance, Amy accepted.
1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Reckoning

1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The gigantic teens looked down at their domain.

"They all belong to us now." Amy's voice rumbled "Its time humanity learned its place, to serve us and worship us."
The younger goddess found herself falling back into her role as a deity. June was right about them belonging above everyone, even those she loved most.

Amy wasn't really going to make her loved ones worship her though, at least not when they were alone.

June squeezed Amy's ample bubble butt and nibbled on ear "Time to get to work babe. Then later we're having a threesome with that sexy little girlfriend of yours."

The goddesses moved to stand either side of the palace and smirked at the pathetic building. It barely reached their shins.

Amy contacted Megan through their connection with each other "Babe, I want you to take everyone with you, Kyle and Mel can stay put, and bring them to the top of the palace. Make it clear it is not a request."

Megan obeyed her goddess and told the others to come with her.

Dennis snapped angrily when he was told of his sisters order "Not a request? Does she think she can give commands to us now or something?"
Megan shrugged "She can and she has. I'm sure she's just showing off to June, I doubt she wants you worshiping her."
Karen calmed her boyfriend down "You heard her when she said we weren't to be harmed, she even demanded June apologize for what she's done. She's still Amy up there."

Dennis huffed in annoyance and followed Megan and the others. "Amy had better know what she's doing."


Amy and June waited patiently for everyone to reach an observation platform at the top of palace, Amy had her eyes trained on it.

Eventually she saw them filing out onto the platform and smiled. Before she could say anything, June spoke first.

"First things first." the elder goddess boomed "On your knees."

There were protests from the group and they looked to Amy for help. They were shocked and distraught at her response.

"You heard her, get on your knees before your goddesses." Amy thundered, smirking at her tiny loved ones.
Inside she was annoyed at June but they couldn't show division, not right now.

The tiny group slowly complied and fell to their knees in submission to the immense blondes. Dennis was pissed and snarled at Megan "Tell her I don't want to see here anymore. She can stay up there and play god and I'll go my own way."

Amy heard this and desperately fought back tears. Her fears were coming true, her family was going to hate her.
June heard as well and looked at Amy's heartbroken face. She got the feeling it would be in their best interests to dial back when it came to their family, especially her twin.

June had just met him and she didn't want to destroy any chance at having a relationship with him. But it would have to wait until they could speak in person. They couldn't show weakness to the other mortals and seemingly flip flop on what they expected.

"See, was that so hard?" June boomed "This is how its going to be now. All below must praise and revere us. Even you guys."

Amy addressed the world "Now for the rest of you mortals, its time you returned to your lives outside the palace. None of you belong in the home of the divine."

A few more words and the girls shrank down to visit the others.

Amy found Dennis in his room. He refused to even acknowledge she was there as she spoke to him.
"It was just a show bro. I had to put in on in front of June and the rest of the world." she pleaded with him.
He still didn't respond.
"I promise it'll be okay, no one will ever hurt our family again. I won't tolerate June treating you bad, you don't have to kneel before anyone."

"But you still made us do it." Dennis said, barely above a whisper. "I was stupid to think coming here would be any different from where I grew up. I think I'll go back home and live with dad again, assuming he's still there."

That hit Amy hard. "You can't seriously think that." she cried "This is nothing like what happened back there."

"I don't belong here Amy. You're a goddess right? And I'm just a worthless tiny mortal like I've always been." Dennis had tears running down his face as he started throwing things into a suitcase.

"So you're just gonna run without saying goodbye?" June said as she walked into the room.
"I'm not bowing to you if that's what you expect June." Dennis continued packing without even glancing at his twin.

June sat on the bed and watched him "I wont stop you from going, but how the hell are you planning on getting there? You do belong here, with us, with me. I'm your fucking twin and you're just going to abandon me..."

Dennis snorted and looked into his twins eyes, his eyes, "I doubt the great and powerful goddess will even notice I'm gone, and for how I'm getting home, I'll ask one of moms pilots to take me. Hopefully Karen will come to."

It was June's turn to fight back tears "Of course I'll notice you're fucking gone. I've always noticed you were fucking gone." she screamed and spun him around to face her "Even before I knew you existed I noticed you weren't there."

Dennis was stunned by his twins outburst.

"And don't act like you didn't feel the same way." the goddess ranted "If... if.. if you go I'll fucking constantly come see you, and wont let you forget about me. I'll fucking sleep outside your house every night, I'll be be so big you can't ignore me."

Her siblings stared at her, she sounded crazy. Dennis shook his head in disgust and went back to packing.

"Do what you want goddess. I wont care how big you are, I got used to ignoring giants growing up." he said and was about finished when he heard a newcomer.

It was Kyle. The bruised emo ignored June and went straight to Dennis's side. "You shouldn't go, you belong here with the rest of us. You really want to back to being alone?"

Amy was about to say something but Kyle shook his head, she stayed silent.

"You said you had no friends growing up, but now you have us. None of us want to lose you over this, you wanted to be with your mom and Amy all your life, don't give up on that." Kyle managed to smile "Besides, you owe me for saving your life."

Dennis laughed "Okay, I guess I could stick around for you MechanEmo. I still think its time I visited dad though, I should at least check if he's alright."
Kyle smiled and hugged his friend "Thanks Captain Cripple."

Amy stared at June and motioned to Kyle. The older girl knew what Amy expected of her.

The goddess took a deep breath and started apologizing "Kyle, I'm very sorry for what I did to you. Hurting you was unacceptable and I'll do whatever I can to make it up to you and Mel."

Kyle briefly made eye contact with June before looking to Amy. "So where do we go from here? I know whatever tech was inside June was fucking with her head but..." he asked his friend.
Amy hugged her friend gently "This is my fault really. If I hadn't rushed into things... I'm sorry Kyle. I'm sorry for everything."

Kyle returned her hug and comforted the upset goddess "Come on, goddesses shouldn't cry." he joked "We'll always love you Amy, I don't care how big and powerful you are. We're family, yeah?"
The goddess lifted Kyle up and hugged him tighter "I love you guys so much, I'll always love you to. I know I'm a goddess now but that wont change."

Kyle left and went back to Amy's room where Mel was sleeping.

Dennis sighed and sat down on his bed. "You really going ahead with this?"

Amy nodded "I am a goddess Dennis, and, and, you should start treating me like one..."
She was caught off guard by her own words and quickly apologized "I'm sorry, I shouldn't say that to you."
Part of Amy did mean it though, and she knew it.

Dennis laughed at Amy's outburst "I guess I got used to mom calling herself a god. I suppose I'll learn to tolerate it from you two as well."

June shoved her sister lightly "You trying to drive my twin away after he just agreed to stick around?"
She couldn't believe it was herself of all people dissuading Amy from behaving like a goddess.

Dennis remembered he need to bring something up "So what about Doctor Beckett, June? Kyle told me what you did."

June would only accommodate her brother when it came to family matters but otherwise "I'm not releasing them Dennis. I'm their goddess and unlike with you I wont show mercy. This is not up for discussion."

Dennis glared but realized he was in no position to do anything about it. His twin was obviously serious about the goddess thing and could see she wouldn't change her mind. Maybe one day he could persuade her once they became close enough

"Sooo." June said "You think I can come meet our father with you? If you don't mind."

"Uh, fine." Dennis agreed "But please control yourself, it'll be difficult enough as is without you making it more awkward."
1521311111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Praise them

Brian was pottering around his shop when he felt himself growing. He rushed outside to see the entire town was growing and only stopped when it reached a normal height.

There was a flash and a shadow overtook them. Standing above the town was a beautiful giant girl.

"I can't believe you came like this." Dennis complained from June's hand.
"At least I put clothes on after you whined at me." the goddess giggled. "And look, I returned the mortals to their natural height."
Dennis groaned "Ugh. Could you shrink down so you can actually fit inside."

June didn't want to and refused "Nah. I belong up here little brother. I will not be the same size as these humans."
"You were okay with it back home." he responded.
June shrugged "That's different since we were around family."

Speaking of Family, June had regrown her parents and actually broken down in tears over what she'd done to them. She was surprised they accepted her apology after she explained how the implants had made her so unstable. June had mostly stabilized after she's fixed her enhancements but she wasn't exactly the same as she was before.
The goddess had undergone some permanent changes and it wasn't like she hadn't done terrible things, even before the upgrades, she had helped Amy eat millions of people after all.

June was still perfectly happy to eat and crush anyone who she didn't love. She wasn't going to be as lenient with her own friends like Amy was though, she would still expect them to kneel and worship her as a goddess. But that could wait.

Dennis had spotted his dad and pointed June his way.

Brian was shaking as the giantess turned and looked right at him. He found himself frozen on the spot as she smiled and walked towards him.

Dennis chuckled as he realized this was similar to how Amy had come into his life. A giant blonde girl, his sister, walking into town for the first time to meet the family she'd never known.

June stopped and looked at the tiny man at her feet "Hey there. You must be my dad."

Brian had no idea how to respond. This girl looked a lot like Amy but he was pretty sure this wasn't her. This giantess was slightly older and more developed. June had inherited her moms massive tits.

His dad had a shock when June descended and Dennis hopped out of her hand.
"Hey dad." his son said and waved awkwardly.
Brian regained the use of his legs and stumbled forward "Dennis, you came back."

The teenager had no intention of fighting with his dad and let his old man embrace him.
"So lets cut to the chase" Dennis said as they broke apart "This is gonna come as a shock so please don't freak out."
He pointed up at the smiling giantess and introduced her "This is June and... she's my twin. Your daughter."

Brian passed out.

June grimaced as her bio dad hit the floor "Well that went well."

It was illegal for a normal person to step into the zone for tinies but the laws were not heavily enforced so there were cases of the giants(normals) rampaging across the tiny zone and nothing was done to stop them. The only advice given: Hide. Dennis rembered lessons being interrupted by the roof of the school being torn off by giants who wanted to have some fun with the people inside.

Dennis carried a small pocket knife incase they tried to do this to him, hoping it would stave off their childishness. He was underground, they were built as the giants could not get to them below ground.

Dennis didn't respond at first. As he looked up into this beaming giantess, he felt a wave of relief that he wasn't about to be eaten.

"I know," she continued as if that was a rhetorical question. "We need to get a better outfit for you for tonight."

Before Dennis could ask what that meant, she closed him in her fist and walked upstairs to her room. She opened him up and dropped him onto her bed. In front of him were a coupe dozen different outfits, all around his size. The girl sat behind him with cross-legs.

"Tonight?" Dennis finally asks.

"Yes cutie, you'll need to wear something better to the party," she remarks matter of factly. "I can't wait to show off my special little man to my friends!"

"I'm going to a party with you? I don't even know your name."

"That's cause you never asked silly. It's Jessica, and yes, it's gonna be a great time."

Seeing he had no choice, Dennis chose a different tactic. "Where did these clothes come from? What's wrong with what I have on right now?"

"You're clothes look like poor people clothes. I can't have you looking like you just accidentally crossed your way into the rich area. These are the clothes from my doll collection. I've always wanted to dress one of you live little ones before anyways. Don't worry. It'll be fun."

With that she started to giggle with excitement. This caused the bed tremble, making Dennis fall onto a nearby outfit.

"Okay, we can start with those."

Before he could get up, Jessica had scooped him into her palm and started undressing him with her other hand.

"You know I can do this myself," he stated.

"Don't be silly!" she replied as she took him down to his underwear.

She then proceeded to put his new outfit on. A sailor's uniform. This didn't satisfy her, and she went for another. She tried about a dozen outfits until finally deciding on a tuxedo.

"Perfect. You look adorable!" she giggled. He had never worn anything like this before, and he felt awkward. He figured he'd be the only person in a tuxedo at a regular party, but he knew he didn't have much of a choice.

Although she had at first been a little annoyed at the tiny for being in the "normal" section of town, she quickly felt sorry for the fellow and figured that he might be lost and alone, with no one to turn to. 'Besides', she thought 'he looks kind of cute. If only he were my size...' Aphrodite resolved to place him in her side pocket, and safely out of sight. She could catch up to Samantha later.

Dennis, of course, knew none of this. All he knew was that he was now the captive of a total stranger and that he could quite possibly never see his home or friends again.
15333.title: Aphrodite

153332.content:
Aphrodite started to rush home. She couldn't wait to learn more about this new little guy. All Dennis felt was a dizzying array of movements and sounds as he was bounced up and down in her pocket. On her way back, she happen to run into Samantha playing on the side of the street.

"Hey Samantha, guess what I found!" she called to her.

Samantha looked over as she pulled Dennis out. Before he knew it, he was in the palm of a hand, face to face with two giantesses. The first stared back at him googley-eyed and the second with contempt.

"So you found a little poor guy," Samantha responded.

"I know! Isn't he adorable!"

"He's disgusting. Like a bug."

"Oh don't say that."

"We need to get rid of it," Samantha said sternly. Samantha tried to grab for him, but Aphrodite closed her hand.

"No I plan to keep him. I'll take care of him, and..." Aphrodite pleaded

"And what, maybe someday that poor lilttle bug will become your husband. Don't make me laugh!"

"Maybe, I don't know." Aphrodite mumbled, blushing.

"Look. This isn't a good idea. He's just another poor little things. He's probably a thief and certainly hasn't showered in a real long time. What, will you take care of him like a little pet forever? What if he inherits your wealth and becomes big, like you? You'll loose interest in him."

"That's not true," she shouted.

"Just give him to me, and I can dispose of him for you. We can forget this ever happened." She reached out her palm. Dennis felt Aphrodite's grib on him tighten as she considered what to do...

We write the year 2080. The people of earth are one... Finally. The great leaders managed to step behind their differences and peace was uppon earth.

A few years after the invention of size changing technologies a new social reform was set up that every man and every women should be adjustet in size by their wealth.

This story deals with the problems of this new world order about the big rich ones and small poor people


Some rules:
